Twilight just smirked at Rarity. “Well. Are we going or what?” Twilight was already out the door.

Rarity shook her head and sputtered. “U-um, T-Twilight...” Rarity followed her outside.

“Yes?”

Rarity asked in a hushed tone, “Didn’t you say that you have stayed relatively restricted in your eating habits? How could you possibly know that you can eat all that in one sitting?”

Twilight blushed again and tried to look away. She made sure to whisper in Rarity’s ear. “W-well. Uh, I have cheated a few times....And...when I did, I would go all out. Whenever I got caught by my parents or Celestia, I was punished or forced to burn off the calories....When I first came to Ponyville, it was the first time I didn’t have somepony to keep me in check. I was confident that I could stay in control on my own. A-and, I was.......f-for the most part.....A couple nights in....I binged while Spike was asleep on half of the order that we are about to make...." She started breathing quickly as she hesitated to add, “P-p-pizza is my favorite.”

Rarity just didn’t have anything to say. Twilight Sparkle was filled with surprises today. They both walked for a few minutes until they were in front of the cashier within the pizzeria. He was a lanky, young stallion with brown eyes, a tan coat, and blonde mane.

He looked at Twilight with a smile. The last time she came, which was a while ago, she made a pretty large order for herself. She realized her mistake in saying that it was all for her when it was too late and pleaded that he tell nopony about her visit. She made his boss very happy that night. Most ponies around town couldn’t afford the amount that she bought or just didn’t require so much pizza. She had the same irregular look of gleeful anxiety on her face. He knew what was up. Twilight Sparkle was now well known within the town. However, everypony thought that she wasn’t big on ordering out and eating in general. Even the cashier’s boss didn’t know that she made the order. He put two and two together and figured that Twilight was secretly madly in love with pizza. He understood that she probably restricted herself from it to keep her figure.

“Well, well, well. What can I get for ya, Twilight Sparkle?”, he said in a knowing tone.

Twilight was panicking internally. “Oh no....” *He remembers me. I didn’t even think about what I said to the cashier last time...* She made sure that nopony else other than Rarity was in the restaurant with her. She sighed heavily then said dully, “Hello....um...”

“Customer Service.”

“Is.....that really your name?”

“Yep. Proud of it too.”

“Well, Customer Service, you seem to remember what happened last time I came here. I...I appreciate you not saying anything about it to anypony. Since then, as far as I know, nopony had found out. So, I can only assume that you kept your promise.”

“My lips have been sealed, Twilight Sparkle. So, you plannin’ on havin’ another binge?”

She recoiled at the question with her eyes the size of pinpricks. Her face was scrunched up and cheeks rosy. She looked like she had been caught stealing from somepony’s house. Rarity was snickering, trying her hardest to hold in her violent laughter and keep her composure.

The cashier laughed humbly. “Don’t sweat it, Twilight. We all have our quirks. I’m actually glad to know that you aren’t as plain as most ponies would assume. Now, about your order.”

Twilight was about to say something about his remark on ponies seeing her as plain, but she figured that he meant well. He was right. Everyone has a strange quality or two. Some more than others. And, she and Spike had qualities that went hoof in hoof. It made her realize just how good this decision might turn out. But, enough about that. She had a feast to order.

Twilight regained her composure and smirked at the cashier. “I’ll have ten cheese pizzas and two 2 liter bottles of soda.”

“Coming right up! It’ll take a bit though.” Customer Service turned to go into the back to tell the cooks about the order.

“Oh, that’s fine. I’ve got some business to take care of that may also take a bit.”

Rarity asked, “What ever do you mean, Twilight?”

Twilight just pointed to the restroom, then ran in.

“....Oh.....”
11121211.title: Pizzaholic

111212111.content:
So, after Twilight's 'business', she and Rarity decided to teleport back to Carousel Boutique with the pizza feast for her to have some privacy with her shameless gluttony. Once again, she didn't want anypony catching her making an absolute pig of herself at the library. It was more likely to happen now since the day was in the late afternoon. Rarity offered to continue helping her on her quest to become fat for her faithful assistant.

Little did Twilight know, Rarity was a little excited about this venture for her own reasons.

Rarity made sure that nopony could see into her kitchen as Twilight set the pizza boxes on the table. Twilight got a stool and plopped down on it. She was salivating profusely and couldn't wait another second. She felt as if she hadn't eaten in days.

Her magic flipped open the first box and wrapped around a single slice. It's beautiful, steamy presence was just too much for the little librarian to resist.

"Come to mama!"

She took the first bite and moaned in ecstasy. She proceeded to ravenously devour it with zero restraint. The grease splattered all over her cheeks and muzzle.

"~Aaaaaahh....Oh my gosh....I love you, pizza....~" She then remembered that Rarity was right there with her, blushed and frowned. She wanted to just hide away in shame.

Rarity giggled. She floated a handkerchief over to Twilight's face and wiped the grease off. "Oh, come now, darling. I won't judge you for this. You're safe to indulge as you wish while I'm here. However, you may make a mess in my kitchen if you're going to eat like that."

*Here is my chance...*

Rarity blushed, herself. A pizza slice wrapped in blue magic floated towards Twilight. Twilight looked obliviously puzzled by this sudden change of pace.

"....What are you doing?....."

"Y-you simply must-er....show SOME restraint....for Spike of course! You want him to enjoy feeding you, correct?"

"Well, yeah. That is part of the fantasies that he wrote."

"Well, if you want him to stay attracted to you as his feedee, there are a few things that you must practice to fancy his taste and really give him the best experience.....A-and....I could be your...your-erm...training feeder?....I-If I may..."

"Hmmm....That does make sense. You are really willing to do that for Spike and I?"

"Why, of course! I will support you two as much as I possibly can!" Rarity was beginning to get giddy. Her plan was working.

"You really are a great friend, Rarity. I'm sure that you know a lot more about this 'fetish' stuff than I do. Ooooh, it's like a new subject to study! And, I get to eat what I want because of it! I'm guessing that we should start by letting you feed me? I want to get a feel for being fed by somepony else. Then, I can figure out how to be a better uh....What was it?"

"Feedee?"

"Right!" *GROOWL* Twilight chuckled nervously. The pizza slice that still hovered in Rarity's magic was brought back to her attention. She licked her lips longingly.

"C-can we start now?", Twilight whimpered.

Rarity smiled lewdly. She had her gluttonous friend right where she wanted her. Spike was going to get his fantasies fulfilled. And, Rarity would reap the temporary benefits. She could indulge in her own interests - while, at the same time - giving all that she could to her best friends.

It was good to be generous.
111212111.title: New research!

choices: Twilight Sparkle wakes up 15 pounds heavier
Rarity has a dream about Twilight
1112121111.content:
"Of course we can begin, Twilight...We will start by teaching you to relax and allow me to feed you at my own pace."

"So, I just need to sit on my flank and accept whatever you give me? That's a pretty lazy procedure....But, it does sound nice...."

"A feeder likes to have relaxed control over his or her lazy glutton. Now, ~be a good little piggy and eat your pizza.~"

The pizza slice floated into Twilight's salivated maw. She took a big bite out of it and chewed sloppily before swallowing forcefully. She tried to tear the rest apart like before, but ended up chomping on nothing. Rarity had pulled the slice back after the first bite.

Twilight groaned. "Rarityyy." She whined.

"~Oh, no no no, my darling piggy.~ You must control your hunger for just a bit. Don't you fret, mamma will fill you up until you can't move soon enough."

Twilight's now rosy cheeks were threatening to put her whole face on fire. Rarity's behavior had thrown her off guard. She felt quite embarrassed about her current situation, now. However, she figured that this was just part of her lesson in being an obedient feedee.

"Y-y-yes, ma'am."

"Thank you. If you are good and pace yourself, I will stuff you up like you've never been before."

What remained of the half eaten slice floated back into Twilight's face. She reluctantly took a more modest bite, chewed it properly, and swallowed. The slice moved in again as she repeated. Soon enough, the slice was gone. "MMmmmm." Rarity continued to feed her like this for four more slices. Leaving only two left for the first pie.

"Oooooh...mmmmm..." Twilight rubbed her soft middle contently.

Twilight had to admit, it wasn't getting into her at a pace that she was used to, but she was able to further savor the taste. Her body became less tense as she relaxed with the wonderful sensation in her mouth and belly. This was the laziest she had ever felt while eating. She was putting almost no effort while Rarity filled her. However, Twilight was getting nowhere near full. In fact, she was feeling hungrier than ever.

"You a very good eater, dear." Rarity wrapped the last two slices in her magic and put one on top of the other like a sandwich.

"Here is your reward."

Rarity had the pizza approach Twilight a little faster. The double slice sandwich was gently crammed into her. Twilight moaned as she chewed up enough of it to fill her cheeks. The remaining half of the slice sandwich pulled away to give Twilight time to swallow the first. Twilight swallowed, and rubbed her tummy in delight. She licked her lips as the other half floated over. Rarity allowed her to greedily devour it.

“MMMMPH! *GUUULP* *sigh*.....*BURP* Rarity....have you done this before?..."

“W-why....of course not, darling!...What ever would give you that idea?”

“Just wondering. That was absolutely brilliant! You really know how to spoil me. I don’t think that I could ever not do that with pizza, now! Now, give me more!!...I-I mean....You may continue...” She blushed.

“Of course, dear...” *That was close.*

Rarity continued with the second by stuffing Twilight with two slices at a time. The feeding was going faster and slightly looser as both Rarity and Twilight began to get further into it. Twilight even took pleasure in allowing Rarity to pat and rub her slowly hardening middle when they were done with the second pie. Unladylike belches and more playful behavior released as the third pie got demolished.

*BRAAAAAAPT* Twilight giggled adorably. "WOO! I am such a pig! But, I love it! I am pretty thirsty, Rare. Why don't I show you how to chug a two litter bottle of soda!"

Said bottle hissed as the cap came off. The purple, adorably nerdy mare chugged and chugged, rapidly draining the bottle of it's contents. Twilight was looking bloated and drunk on gluttony at this point. She seemed more loopy and brash. And, Rarity was starting to get anxious and sweaty because of it. She bit her lip.

*This is, as Rainbow would say, getting pretty hot. Oh, Spike, you are so lucky.*

The loudest and longest belch that Rarity had ever heard in her life had punctuated Twilight's victory over the high-calorie soft drink. She could've sworn that the fine china on the shelves of her kitchen had rattled slightly during her friend's thunder. Rarity just stared in awe as Twilight hiccuped and giggled in a drunken stupor.

When Twilight noticed the staring, her face turned beet red. "S-soooo.....R-Rarity-*HIC*-how am I doing as a feedee? *uuurrrrp*" She rubbed her spherical middle and waited nervously for Rarity's answer. *Oh no. Did I do something wrong?*

Rarity's face was neutral and sweaty. Another handkerchief floated over in her magic and started wiping the sweat away as she continued to stare expressionlessly. She was using all of the masterful composure that she had trained over all of her years of practicing proper etiquette that she could muster. It was nearly physically straining not to let loose and grope and stuff Twilight furiously. She would probably do even more than that.

"Darling.....might I say....that you are truly the fastest learner in all of Equestria? No wonder Celestia chose you as her student."

"Oh-*HIC*-you're just saying that."

Rarity began to approach this beautiful mare. "No, really. Spike is going to have everything that he wanted out of you and more, dear. Now..."

Rarity hopped onto the table and sat in front of her voracious student. The fourth pizza box magically opened. The entire pie floated out. Twilight's eyes became glossy and dilated. Her jaw slacked, and drool dripped profusely.

"W-wha...What are you doing, Rarity?"

The slices were broken up. One of them went into Rarity hoof. With her free hoof, she gently massaged Twilight's tight paunch. The librarian's cheeks puffed out into a low burp. She closed her eyes and moaned in pleasure as Rarity continued to help her digest.

"I'm gonna make you blow up like a parade float. A very heavy, adorable, and over inflated one at that. And, you will enjoy it so."

Rarity pushes her whole hoof into Twilight's snout. The pizza slice filling up her cheeks. She chewed it up passionately, swallowing it whole and hard. Rarity could actually feel the belly expand from the acceptance of the morsel.

Twilight looked at Rarity with a lewd smile. "Then I hope Spike can handle all of me by then. Otherwise, your responsible for making me too big for him to take. Not me."

"Pfft. Twilight, please. When you were moved here, you probably would've had to be carried by TEN pegasus soldiers if you weren't disciplined beforehoof."

"Touche'."

One by one the slices fell. Twilight's stomach getting closer and closer to the table she was sitting in front of. Fourth pie; fifth pie; sixth pie. At this point Twilight was so stuffed and bloated that she was close to becoming completely round. She opted to lay on her back as Rarity laid on top of her. The second soda bottle was empty and, before they knew it, Twilight had devoured ten pizza pies by herself. She in an immediate food coma after that. A round, hardened, purple ball filled with cheese, tomato sauce, crust, soda and grease slept soundly on the fashionista's kitchen floor.

"Luckily, I learned this spell while she was asleep, after lunch."

She cast a digestion spell that would allow Twilight to process all of that food over night. She wasn't confident in her ability to move her friend out of the kitchen, safely. So, she moved a sofa into it and laid Twilight on it.

"Sweet dreams, my dorky porker. You'll probably be a little bigger by tomorrow."
1112121111.title: Feedee in Training

11122.content:
Twilight sat in her personal study room, doing as the room's title suggests, studying. Right now she was reading an interesting book over magical theory.

In the fifth year of Princess Celestia reign, Starswirl the Bearded proposed that while Unicorns were born with a certain amount of magic, this amount could increase. Starswirl believed that since magic came from the pony's lifeforce, to increase the amount of magic a Unicorn had to somehow increase their own lifeforce. While there have been differing opinions on the true definition of a lifeforce, Starswirl associated with the condition of a pony's body. If a Unicorn was sickly, then they would have less magical potential, while if a Unicorn was healthy, then they would have greater magical potential. Now, while being healthy increases magical potential, it does not significantly increases the amount of magic. To do this a pony will have to do one of two options. One way is to increase one's physical fitness is one way to increase one's lifeforce and the amount of magic a pony has. The second way is to increase one's girth. The second option was theorized by Starswirl to not only be the easiest option, but the most effective of the two options. Since fat is essentially stored energy, it is theoretical that a Unicorn's would become more powerful or be able to sustain a spell for a longer period of time. However, nopony has ever tested Starswirl's theory, and thus remains a mystery today.


Twilight tapped a hoof on her chin. Why has nopony tried this yet? After all, Starswirl was right about everything he researched.

She sat for a few more minutes, then pulled out a blank research journal, labeling it 'Testing Starswirl's Magic Increase Theory, Second Way.'

Twilight hated physical exercise, and it was theorized that it was the least beneficial. Plus, she could pack on a few pounds in a short amount of time and get results quickly. Nodding, she got up and grabbed her saddlebags.

"Spike! I'm going to Sugarcube Corner and the Market Square!"

Without waiting for a reply, Twilight left to begin her experiment.

<Two Months Later>

Twilight sat on a very comfortable cushion in Rarity's house, having been invited to come over and have tea. The past two months had been successful in Twilight's mind, though down right horrifying to her friends and mentor. Twilight had gone from a thin, sleek mare to a soft mass of flesh. Her underbelly hung down close her knees but not quite, she had acquired a second chin, her legs looked like she was wearing thick Winter gear and her sides bulged out to look like she was wearing saddlebags. Rarity was sitting across from her in her classic sofa.

"So darling, I was wondering when I might have a chance to measure you again? You have outgrown my last measurements."

Twilight pulled out her schedule, ignoring Rarity's stab at her recent acquisition.

"I'm free for tomorrow. I can't do a measurement right this moment though, got studying to do."

Twilight's stomach let out a low growl. Twilight didn't even blush.

"Oh, that's quite alright dear. I after all do need to buy a new tape measure."

Twilight smiled.

"Alright. I'll be here tomorrow afternoon."

Twilight waddled out of the shop, leaving a mildly fuming Rarity.

By the time Twilight reached the library, she was a sweating, huffing mess. She never really left the library these days, not since discovering that Sugarcube Corner delivered, along with several other fast food restaurants in Ponyville.

I need to start teleporting to places. It would give me more feedback on any increases in my magic anyways.

Twilight made her way into the kitchen. She had installed several refrigerators and the cabinets were never empty. Pulling eight pizzas from the refrigerators along with a large double chocolate cake and several bottles of apple soda. She was very hungry. Rarity had made a point not to feed Twilight any food, so she was without access to her snacks and one of her six square meals a day for more than a hour. She quickly heated the pizzas with her magic and set them down on the dinner table, lowering her wide rump onto a familiar cushion.

She ripped out a large chunk out of a helpless pizza and bit into the cheesy goodness. Her starving belly let out a growl for more, to which Twilight obliged. She dug into three of the pizzas before taking a guzzle of apple soda. Twilight settled into a routine of eating a large slice of pizza before taking a gulp of the soda. By the time she was done, her stomach was slightly protruding. Her attention was soon set on the cake.

Pulling out a knife from the drawer, she cut a large slice of cake, levitating the chunk of chocolate heaven towards her. She tore through the cake after the first slow, savoring bite. Soon, the cake was gone, leaving no traces other than the smears on Twilight's face. She topped off the cake by draining an entire soda in one go, a feat she was rather proud of. Her belly was now noticeably poking out after her meal. Twilight sat still.

"Bbbbbuuuuuurrrrrrppp!"

Sighing in relief, she heaved herself out of the comfortable cushion, grabbing several extra-large chip bags, some boxes of cupcakes and more soda before making her way to the study room. She snagged a book on Zebra Alchemy she had ordered recently and positioned herself on the second most used cushion in the library.

Despite the recent meal, Twilight still snacked. Twilight wasn't even conscious of her eating when she was studying. Her stuffed stomach continued to balloon outwards, though at a slower pace then before.

Before her experiment, Spike would have to drag her away from her books. Now, all it took was a lack of snacks or that it was the next meal time.

After her magic failed to bring the next batch of chips or cupcakes into her mouth, she discovered she was out of food. She got up and moved back to the kitchen. Spike was already there, cooking haycon, eggs, pancakes, and waffles. It was breakfast night. She was about to sit down when Spike turned to her.

"Check the journal."

Frowning, she opened the journal to find that before she ate, she had to test her magic to see if there were any changes to her level of magic. Her stomach let out a defeated rumble.

Twilight waddled down into the basement to where a block of marble stood.

Before beginning any experiment, one must have a control. Her control was trying to create a realistic golem that though it was a pony. Her first attempt left her exhausted. Her creation was pony in shape, but still looked like a marble statue, and continued to call her 'master' and called itself 'servant,' despite her trying to get the golem to stop.

She channeled magic into her horn, her mind forming the spell. She aimed at the statue...

11123.content:
"Mmmmm, this strawberry lemon shortcake is delicious!" Twilight complimented as she savored the rich sugary flavor of the confectionery before her, chewing slowing and deliberately before swallowing the cake slice with a small gulp.


The pink pony to whom she'd be speaking squealed excitedly and clopped her hooves together in glee. "Ooohhhh I knew you'd like it Twilight I knew it I Knew It I KNEW IT!!" Being able to get away from the rigidly hectic orderly life she normally lived, even if it was only a few times a week or month, had practically been like a breath of fresh air for the studious mare. They played, snuggled, goofed off and indulged themselves in various sweets.


Said indulgence, of course, is what had resulted in the current situation the two fillyfriends were in now. Ever since she was foal Twilight had always had a major sweet tooth, yet her studies, magical lessons and the occasional spine tingling adventure had always prevented her from partaking in satisfying her cravings for sugary delights. If she ended up big as a barn because of her binges so be it, being pampered and dotted over by Pinkie was all worth it.

"I've always got room for those cupcakes of you-BRAAAAAAPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTT!!" the unicorn was cut off as she let out a huge belch. Pinkie just smiled and giggled in amusement, "Oh Twilight you don't have to apologize silly, especially since you make just the bestest belchy welchies" she chirped as she bounced over to a table in the room and came back with a large tray of freshly baked cupcakes and other treats. Mouth watering in anticipation Twilight instantly levitated a cupcake off the tray and greedily wolfed it down, followed soon by another and then a big piece of banana cream cake. Pinkie soon joined in the gluttony as she scarfed down a few jelly beans and cherry turnovers, watching gleefully as Twi's belly grow bigger and rounder with each sugary good she devoured.


Pretty soon after thirty minutes of non stop eating....

choices: Twilight and Pinkie aren't the only chubby ponies

"Ugh,... I'm feel like I'm gonna bust I'm so full," Twilight moaned as she reclined against a big stuffed animal. The scholar unicorn couldn't recall the last time she'd eaten so much, not even on her first visit to Ponyville when she'd stuffed herself silly with Applejack's apple pies. "BBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!! !!!!!"


Twilight nearly bowled over with laughter as her friend's blubbery frame jiggled and wobbled from the force of her gaseous outburst. "Yeah well you are bigger than me Pinkie, though not by much," Twilight teased as she waddled over to her plumped up fillyfriend. The two jumbo sized ponies shared a quick smooch and rubbed noses as Twilight reclined against Pinkie's bloated stuffed tummy, the pink pony turned over and playfully rubbed and poked at her companion's stuffed belly, "Ahhhhhh being big and soft feels soooo amazing, " she said with a happy sigh and murr.



Pinkie couldn't help but break out in a loud chortle "Hehe well due, I told you being chubby wubbly marefriends would be super duper fun, " she stated in her delightfully cheery voice. "We can eat as many sweets as we like and then cuddle and snuggle into each other's big softy comfy tum-tums and have burping contests and after chubby pony marefriend bedtime eat even more goodies and then..."


"Alright Pinkie I get the idea, " Twilight interrupted with a laugh. Pinkie merely beamed her trademark carefree smile at her. The two ponies nuzzled and rubbed each others guts for a few seconds before Pinkie suddenly spoke up. "Hey Twilight I just got a really really super duper idea,"


"Oh, what is it Pinkie?" the portly unicorn asked.


"Well, it's two months since we started being marefriends and all our friends are soooo happy for us and since it's gonna be our Two Monthiversary on Saturday I wanted to throw us all a big Twilight and Pinkie Two Monthiversary It's Fun Being A Chubby Pony party!!" Pinkie explained all in one breath.


"That's a great idea Pinkie, the girls will love it," Twilight answered happily. Pinkie instantaneously sat up on her wide hunches and embraced her book loving marefriend in a mighty hug.


"Ooooohhhh thank you Thank You Twilight it'll be the bestest best party ever I just know it will." the party pony squealed. Twilight kissed her on the cheek as she soon found herself joining in the excitement.

Here are some options for how Twilight Sparkle goes from chubby to just plain huge!

It was another day in the Ponyville library. The sun gently rose above the clouds as a certain lavender unicorn pony rose from her bed. Bringing a hoof up to rub some of the sleep from her eyes, she smiled gently, glancing to her side to see the snoozing pegasus she'd been spending so much time with.

         "Dash..." She called softly, gently nudging the pony, rustling her mane with her snout. "Rainbow Dash, come on, it's time to get up."

         The pegasus simply rolled over with a groan and pulled the blankets closer to herself. The unicorn's face fell as she blew a lock of her purple hair out of her eyes. "Oh, I see." She smirked playfully. "Well, I happen to know a spot on you that is just perfect for... TICKLING!" She shouted, laughing as she reached over and began to dance her hooves across the spot between Dash's wings, making her eyes shoot open as she started to giggle uncontrollably.

         "Alright, alright! I'm *hehe* up!" Rainbow Dash snorted as she sat up in bed and smiled at Twilight. Leaning in to rub her cheek against the unicorn's, Rainbow stretched. "Ugh, what's so important you're waking me up on my day off? It's clear skies today, so you know us weather ponies don't have to do anything but burst some clouds, and I can do that in my free time." She said, her tone almost making it sound as though she were bragging.

         "We were going to have a picnic today, remember? And if we want everything ready and made by lunch time, we'll have to work most of the morning." She teased, making Rainbow laugh.

         "But neither of us can cook, Twi!" She teased, grinning broadly as she hopped out of bed, stretching her back and wings. "Can't we just have Spike make us something?"

         Twilight put a hoof to her chin in thought and sighed. "Well... Alright. But we can at least make breakfast. And maybe you can swing by Sweet Apple Acres and get us a few pies, and fritters... Ooh, and maybe some candied apples!" Her eyes shone at the thought and her stomach growled as she looked to Rainbow Dash expectantly, making the pegasus snicker.

         "Sheesh, Twilight, I think my eating habits are rubbing off on ya'!. Come on, let's go get some eggs and toast." She said, nodding to the stairway, her trim form and rainbow mane strolling away with pride. Twilight couldn't help but bite her lower lip as she watched her go, making a move to follow her before pausing, catching her reflection in the mirror. Maybe Dash was right. She definitely had been eating a lot more... Walking to the mirror, she tilted her head as she looked herself over, from head to hooves.

         From the front, she could see her face had thickened a bit, her neck now puffing outward and making a second chin. Reaching a hoof up to touch it, she sighed. "I guess it's not too bad, right?" She asked her reflection, whose chin bounced and wobbled in response, making her grumble. She blinked, looking down her softer front to notice something... Her belly seemed to be hanging a good deal lower. Turning to the side, she watched it bounce as she turned. It was certainly a lot bigger than it had been before! Hanging heavily between her thicker back legs, it bounced a bit whenever she moved. Pressing a hoof against it, she blushed as she realized how soft it was... "I guess that's why Dash said I made such a nice pillow..." She mused, her eyes turning back to her thicker flank. Taking an experimental step, she watched it jiggle a bit as she did. Had it been doing that with every hoof-fall? "Somepony might need to start watching what they eat..." She mumbled, the flabbier, 100 pound pony continuing to examine herself in the mirror.

         "Hey Twi, get down here! Breakfast is ready!" Rainbow Dash called from the kitchen, making the purple unicorn snap out of her ogglings.

          "Be right down!" She called as she descended the stairs, some worrying thoughts forming in her head as she did. Did Dash think she was fat? Had her friends noticed? And most importantly... What if Rainbow Dash didn't find her attractive after this?! Her eyes widened and her ears flattened at the thought. A landslide of negative thinking followed that thought as she headed for the kitchen, gulping as she sighted the rainbow tail of her marefriend. Sitting at the table across from her, Twilight looked at her food nervously. It looked like half a loaf of bread and a dozen eggs were scrambled just for this meal! And Dash was eating just as much! 'Ugh, why does she get such a good metabolism?' Twilight thought to herself with a huff before taking a cautious bite, smiling as she started eating quickly now, almost out of habit... Sometimes she and Dash would even have competitions on who could eat the most the fastest. Those were always fun. She blushed at the thought before looking up at the pegasus who was scarfing down some toast. "Hey... Dash?" She began cautiously, a bit unsure as to how to approach this.

         Rainbow Dash looked up from her food and tilted her head, a bit of egg speckling her snout as she looked at Twilight Sparkle quizzically. "Yeah, Twi?"

         "Do you think I've um..." The unicorn began, tracing a circle on the table with her hoof, gulping as she asked, "Do you think I've been getting fat."

         Rainbow Dash blinked, bursting out laughing before saying...

1122211.content:
Three weeks had passed since the day that Rainbow Dash and Twilight Sparkle had began to stuff one another silly. The first day of it had been a frenzy of food, the ponies eating enough to feed a family for a week in one night. Of course, the two already had quite the capacity, so, they didn't get too awful of a tummy-ache, but, the night ended with them snuggling up in bed, their guts gurgling as they digested the feast inside them.

         This became their daily routine, though. Get up, eat, go to bed. Rainbow Dash decided to finally use all of her saved up vacation time and take the whole month off, and Twilight still managed to her job, writing the occasional letter to the Princess, who was a bit confused by all the food stains on it. Still, the two ponies had never been happier than they were now.

         At the moment, Twilight was sitting downstairs, reading as she snacked on some pie that Applejack had so kindly brought by. She hummed lightly as she turned the page with her magic, licking her lips as she took another bite of the delightful baked treat. Where once a chubby mare had been, a truly fat filly now sat. Twilight was out and out flabby, having gained 100 pounds in the past three weeks, putting her just over 200. Burping loudly, she smiled. Her large belly rested on the floor from her seated position, it was clearly her biggest part. It wobbled and shook with every waddle she made, pressing against her much thicker legs, visible easily from all angles now, even bulging past her sides a ways! Her face was thick and round, with two chipmunk cheeks that made her squint a bit, and her neck was thick and adorned with extra chins that pressed against her fatter, softer front. Glancing at the clock on the wall, she smiled. "Rainbow, it's time for lunch!" She called to her marefriend who called back. "Yeah, yeah, be right there."

         Some heavy hoof-falls followed as the cyan pegasus made her way downstairs, and when she came into view Twilight Sparkle couldn't help but bite her lip and grin. Rainbow Dash was out and out huge. Her once toned, trim form was now even fatter and flabbier than Twilight's! The former fastest flyer in all of Equestria now looked more like the fastest eater. The now 235 pound pegasus smiled at Twilight as she huffed a bit, clearly tired from the short waddle downstairs, making the unicorn giggle. Her triple-chinned face jiggled as she caught her breath, her thick neck forming rolls at just about every joint. Beneath her, her jiggling belly hung low to the ground, occasionally scraping against it when she walked... Soon, she'd have to drag it along. Twilight liked the thought of that. Licking her lips, she nodded. "Let's go into the kitchen, shall we?" She asked, making Rainbow nod and turn to reveal her crowning achievement, her flank. Easily the width of two ponies now, almost three, Rainbow Dash had the fattest flank in all of Ponyville. It wobbled and bounced as she walked, swaying back and forth behind her, rolling down into her fat, thick hindlegs. Twilight grinned at the sight and waddled happily behind her. She was loving the new Rainbow Dash.

         Twilight grunted as she plopped down at the table, leaning across to rub noses with Dash who giggled as they did. "Yeesh, Twilight, you've been really lovey dovey since we got so fat, you know that?" She teased.

         Twilight nodded happily and kissed her marefriend, saying, "Of course... I dunno, Dash, something about you being all big and soft is just so... Amazing." She said with a happy sigh.

         Dash laughed, rolling her eyes, "Sheesh, Twilight, you're enjoying this even more than I am, and I'm the one who wanted you big in the first place." She teased with a chuckle. "Now, come on, let's eat!"

Rainbow Dash paused for a second to catch her breath and muttered, "Dang it, Twilight, you just had to make me all fat for you..."

Your friends are here to see you!" she exclaimed.

How's the dating going, Oooohhhh, I bet it's good, you two are so CUTE together!" She shouted, rambling a bit before blinking as she tilted her head, noticing just how fat they were. "Oh, wowie! I always like it when people enjoy my cupcakes and you two look like you could enjoy a LOT of cupcakes!" That night, Twilight and Rainbow were sitting in Sugarcube Corner, talking. The party was scheduled to begin any minute, and their friends were bound to be here soon. The pudgy Pegasus smiled warmly as she gently pat her marefriend's side. "Hey, Twilight, you alright?" She asked, looking at the enormous purple unicorn who looked deep in thought.

         Snapping out of it, Twilight Sparkle blinked, "Huh? What?" She asked, chuckling. "Oh, uh, sorry, Dash... I got a bit distracted... I'm just thinking is all... Kind of nervous about how our friends will react to all... This." She said, making a sweeping gesture over her giant blobby body. Rainbow Dash giggled at this.

         "Oh, come on, Twi... They're our friends! They'd stick with us through anything! I doubt us getting a little-" She paused as she looked down at her gut which sagged to the floor and squished against her legs. "-okay, really fat, will make too much of a difference. After all, we're still the same ponies we were... There's just more of us to love." She said, smiling as she kissed Twilight on her cheek... It tasted like baked goods.

         Twilight blushed brightly, "Thanks, Rainbow..." She turned to kiss her back, but was interrupted as a loud knock came from the door. Pinkie Pie grinned, bouncing to the door as she sang about what a fun night they were about to have.

         Twilight watched as her friends entered the bakery, blushing a bit as their eyes fell upon the much larger filly before them.... Twilight had expected this kind of reaction, but, hadn't expected this! Her friends stood before her, much pudgier versions of themselves! Applejack had a rather sizeable gut, Rarity's flank was flabby and wobbled as she walked in, and Fluttershy definitely wasn't that soft the last time they'd seen her! Blushing, Twilight said, "Wow, um... Hi girls... I don't mean to be rude, but... how did you all get so... Well, fat?" She did her best to approach the subject tenderly, not sure how the others felt about their gains.

Apparently, thin is no longer in!" She said, grinning. "So, when I heard about everyone plumping up, I simply had to join in, And I think I carry it fabulously, don't you all? And now, I've decided to convert my Boutique into one of the first plus-size stores in Equestria! I'm getting custom orders from all over! Business has never been better!"

         As she finished her gloating, Twilight smiled. "I'm glad to heart that, Rarity! And you do kinda carry it well. It's nice." She said, complimenting her friend who reveled in it. Rainbow Dash snickered, nodding as she waddled over, her belly dragging across the ground as she went.

         "Yeah, it's nice, but you've got nothing on me, feather-weight." She said with a grin, her competitive streak shining through. Rarity rolled her eyes. "Though, I gotta ask, what about the rest of you? Applejack, I'd never thought you'd be one to get fat with how much applebucking you do." She said, tilting her head as she looked over at the orange earth pony.

          Applejack chuckled, "Well, y'see..." She began, a blush rising to her cheeks.

1122211111112212111.content:
Meanwhile, back in the Royal Palace at Canterlot...

When it came to certain affairs of the heart, Princess Celestia was undoubtedly no stranger to such matters.

And yet, here she was, scrolling through various magic sites and articles involving offers of romance. Sure, she was the envy of every nobles' wants, desires, and love (especially given her current corpulent size and girth). However, she had lived long enough to not be fooled.

After all, some members of the rich upper class were quite duplicitous, only caring about advancing their hooves on more power to their ambitious agendas, not once caring about her feelings of romance, which only hardened her heart just a smidge.

And yet, it was thanks to Twilight that her heart had softened, both figuratively and quite literally. Thus, here she was at this moment, scouring through various letters sent to her by numerous suitors, most of which were stacked in a rather substantial pile, as if discarded out of immediate rejection.

"*sigh* This is getting me absolutely nowhere. So much for an easy transition into dating." She sighed, furrowing her brow, whilst she subconsciously rubbed the frontmost section of her voluminous white belly, since she was currently in a sitting position within her private quarters.

"...But then again, I have been out of touch for some time now." She audibly contemplated, to which her thoughts would be abruptly intruded upon as a feminine voice rang out, "--And hear we thought thou would be more contemporary than us, dear sister."

Of course, Celestia easily recognized her guest, as she slowly turned her plump head around, only to gaze upon her younger sister, Princess Luna. A smile calmly encroached upon the obese Alicorn's cherubic face, as if relieved to see her nocturnal sibling once more.

And much like their celestial counterparts, so too were their physical shapes. Whilst Celestia had become an all-out elephantine Princess, Luna retained a surprisingly thinner physique than her.

...Well, mostly thinner physique, as Luna was currently sporting a bit more svelte curves this time around, as the two Alicorn sisters proceeded to embrace one another for a brief moment, Celestia's gargantuan belly practically smothering Luna's smaller form, whilst Celestia promptly quipped, "*chuckle* Oh you have no idea, Luna."

"So...What is this all about, dear sister of thine?" Luna questioned, to which slowly lowered her head as if with shame, huffing out a deep sigh, then looked back at the dark blue Alicorn and explained, "...The truth is, Luna, I...I, um...I-I want to have a marefriend again."

"A...Marefriend? Like your student and her friend?" Luna asked, to which the rotund Celestia confimed with a hefty nod, where she then continued, "...Look, I know what you're probably going to say. We shouldn't be having romantic affairs due to our duties as rulers of Equestria and all that. I remember my duty all too well."

"But...why now, sister? Clearly, there are plenty of suitors to choose from." Luna retorted, motioning her right forehoof towards the large stack of discarded letters before them to which her much fatter sister swiftly answered, "--That's because all those letters are from suitors who seem more interested in raising their social status, rather than wanting to give me love and affection like a true romance should."

Upon hearing such an answer from her more corpulent sibling, Luna obtained a better grasp and comprehension of the situation Celestia had found herself in, as Celestia subconsciously lowered her head with an almost depressed motion to it. In response, Luna calmly placed a forehoof upon Celestia's rounder flabby shoulders in reassurance and understanding to which she then said, "...Thy now see why thou has not chosen a suitor so hastily. Thou seek true romance, correct?"

Without hesitation, Celestia gave a few hefty nods, then (as quickly as her fat could physically allow) wrapped her plump forehooves around her thinner sister out of sheer comfort, with a few small tears streaming down her rounder face, damping her fur a little, where she soon replied, "*sniffle* *sniffle* Yes... Yes... I want a real romance again..."

Upon hearing such a sorrowful tone coming from her fatter sister's tongue, Luna couldn't help but feel empathetic towards Celestia's romance-related plight, which caused her just to tighten her hug amongst her older sibling's burgeoning gut, as if her forehooves could fully sink into the folds of adipose at any given moment. After all that had happened as of late between them, Luna felt like she owed it to Celestia to see her gentle smile once more.

But then...

Luna had an idea.

A rather surprising idea.

As an almost sheepish smile creeped up on her snout, Luna soon began to speak towards her larger sibling and said, "...Thy think we know a way to relieve thou of such regrets."

"*sigh* ...And what do you have in mind, Luna?" Celestia answered, now bearing an almost somber tone in her soothing voice, while the two siblings ended their familial embrace, to which the blue Alicorn promptly retorted, "Thou shall see soon, sister. But for now, please get some rest. It seems thou most undoubtedly needs it."

And with that, as they said their goodnights to one another, Celestia heated herself up and waddled over to her sun-shaped bed, lumbering onto it as she used her Alicorn magic to levitate a bedsheet corner to cover her enormous self up for the night, while Luna calmly exited her sister's personal quarters, quietly closing the massive doors behind her with a muffled *Click-Clack!* in the process.

Whilst she calmly trotted down the lavish halls of the Royal Palace, Luna contemplated as to how she could help her more corpulent sibling in matters of the heart. The synapses in her subconscious paddled to and fro on what sort of plan she could concoct.

However, as she approached the massive double doors to her left, the same sheepish grin appeared once more, where she then decided to enter the room that laid behind the enormous doors, which revealed quite an expansive bedroom. And yet, as she made her way through the neatly strewn piles of tomes, books, and encyclopedias that formed all around her,Luna came upon a familiar sight to her for some time:

A somewhat chubby Unicorn mare, who bore pale yellow fur, a mane and tail in red and two-tone purple streaks. She wore a rather snug yet stretchy dark purple turtleneck sweater, as her violet eyes lingered upon a massive tome propped up by several stacks of encyclopedias, while said eyes hid behind a pair of rigid eyeglasses.

Only one name came to Luna's mind as to the identity of the plump studious mare when she finally spoke her name:

"Moon Dancer?"

Upon hearing her name, along with recognizing the voice, Moon Dancer jolted from her sitting position out of reactionary shock, causing the opened tomes she levitate with her magic to quickly get flung across the room in separate directions, which caused her somewhat plump physique to briefly ripple and jiggle with such abrupt locomotion, as she quickly turned herself around to greet the nocturnal Alicorn princess and stammered, "Oh! Uh, P-Princess Luna! I-I didn't expect you t-to visit me so early."

"Tis quite alright, Moon Dancer. Our apologies for disrupting your studies." Luna apologized, to which Moon Dancer quickly retorted, "No no! It's not a problem, Princess! I, uh...I-I was just about to finish up my studies for the day."

From there, Moon Dancer used her Unicorn magic to promptly close the enormous tome she was reading from out of some hesitant servant-like gesture towards her superior, with a somewhat embarrassed expression upon her slightly chubby face. Ever since she had returned from her banishment, as well as being reverted from her form as Nightmare Moon, Luna noted how Celestia had Twilight Sparkle as her favored student, Luna felt somewhat jealous of this aspiration of a mentor-pupil relkationship between Celestia and her protegé.

So, out of some sort of minute sibling jealousy, Luna sought out a student of her own to teach and mentor, which ultimately led her to the acutely intelligent yet introvert Moon Dancer. Ever since then, Moon Dancer has been living within the Royal Palace as Luna's personal student.

However, due to the obvious overabundance of food and harvests currently in Equestria, Moon Dancer wasn't truly immune to the snowball effect that has every mare in Equestria unwittingly packing on the pounds, though it was surprisingly kept in check via extensive studying of various tomes within the Canterlot Royal Library.

From there, shortly after the two mares greeted one another with a friendly hug, Moon Dancer quickly noted a slightly somber look in her mentor's pristine shimmering eyes, which made the redhead mare all the more concerned, where she then looked back at her beloved mentor and curiously asked, "...Is...Is there something wrong, Princess? You seem...distressed, about something."

Knowing how astute her pupil was to even the most minute of details, Luna figured she might as well confess what's troubling her, to which she exhaled a deep sigh and explained, "...Are you familiar with my elder sister, Moon Dancer?"

"Y-You mean Princess Celestia? Of course, Princess Luna! Everypony knows who she is!" Moon Dancer swiftly yet bluntly retorted, to which her brilliant mind soon connected the proverbial dots, where she soon spoke with a more subtle tone and cautiously asked, "...Why are you asking me this?"

"*sigh* ...Thy will not sugar-coat this predicament, dear Moon Dancer, but...Thy dear sister...she seems to have troubling matters concerning affairs of the heart." Luna inevitably confessed, to which gave a surprised expression on Moon Dancer's equine face and snout.

"I...I-I wasn't aware of such a thing, Princess. Would it be okay to elaborate on this further?" Moon Dancer carefully asked, now aware of how problematic the situation was. In response, Luna once more exhaled a deep somber breath, her head leaning just slightly downwards and retorted, "...It seems like the best course of action as of now, my dear student."

From there, Luna sat down alongside her chubbier student, who listened very keenly on what her nocturnal mentor had to confess.

And confess did the Princess of the Night do...

Flashback
