choices: Applejack, having lost control eats all the food, enough to feed six ponies
There is enough food to feed at least 4 ponies, Applejack eats almost all of it.
Applejack controls her hunger, and only eats twice as  she normally would.
1411.content:
*Whack!* a horde of apples fell. *Smash!* another batch of apples fell. Applejack was currently bucking apples at her family's Sweet Apple Acres, giving fierce kicks to the Apple trees that had been planted there by her Granny years ago. "Phew! Well..that's the last of them apples, now 'ah can finally get back to Big Mac--Sis!" Applejack was then interrupted by her younger sister and her friends. She then turned her head to see the fillies running up to her with their wagon with a bunch of pastries in them. "Well if it ain't the Cutie Mark Crusaders, what y'all be doing with all that delicious looking food, got errands from Pinkie Pie?" Applejack asked to the three fillies. "Oh no, we made them ourselves." Sweetie Belle answered, with a feeling of pride coming from her tone of voice. "Yeah! we figured if we worked together at baking we could get our cutie marks!" Scootaloo cheered, flapping her wings in excitement. "So I thought to have you taste 'em, ya always did have good sense uh taste."

Applejack put her hoof to her chin in remark Applebloom's statement "Yeah, you're right 'bout that, but why didn't ya ask Pinkie Pie? She loves eating stuff like this." the mare said pointing to a cupcake and pie. Applebloom face changed to that of nervousness. "Well...we were but...she's got an odd taste in food..." she said feeling a hint of guilt. Applejack looked to her side, also feeling guilt. "Well alright, then!" Quickly saying to alleviate the slight awkwardness. "Gimme one of those...apple fritters? Applebloom! you didn't make these treat from the stash of apples ah got for the market tomorrow did you?" Applejack said with a bit of anger and suspicion. "N-no ah took all the apples we used from those trees o'er there." the yellow pony retorted, pointing her hoof to a group of trees off the left side of the barn in front of them. What she said was only half-true, as they had taken a good amount of apples from both places. Applejack eyed down her younger sister, still suspicious of her. "Yeah, we only took the apples from over there Applejack, honest." Scootaloo said crossing hr chest with her left hoof. "Hmm..." Applejack grunted taking her sister and friends word as truth now. "Well alright, gimme one then!" "Sure!" Sweetie Belle cheered, throwing an Apple Fritter straight into Applejack's mouth. Chewing for a few seconds letting the taste flow over her tongue and mouth, she slowly lit up with absolute ecstasy from the sensation.

"Oh, wow! Hmm mmh that is the best fritter ah've ever tasted! Give me some more food girls!" Applejack shouted as she licked her lips to get any crumbs on her face. "*gasp*! YAY!" the CMC cheered simultaneously, at that moment they all looked at their flanks to find a cutie mark but, alas they were still blank. "Ah-ah don't get it..." Applebloom said in despair, "Why don't we have our cutie marks? You love our food and we did 'em all right..." she said looking down at the ground dejected and saddened. "*munch* *gulp* Do-don't worry y'all three just need to keep at it, and I'm sure your cutie marks will appear." Applejack said in between her devouring of an Apple Pie from the top of the pile on the wagon.

"Ya sure sis?" "Yeah are you sure?" Applebloom and Scootaloo said in response, with Scootaloo being a bit more demanding in her tone. "Uh huh, just keep making this food, and everypony will love 'em! Now, y'all three mind if ah uhh help taste your goods some more?" Applejack said nearly drooling at this point. "Yeah! We got tons more in the kitchen!" Sweetie Belle said, making a small hop in excitement, waving her hooves in the air. "Great, just lead me to them!" Applejack demanded as the fillies ran off to the Apple family's abode. The four ponies trotted along to the home, with Applejack going at the treats nopony's business, once they had made their way into the kitchen Applejack marveled at the sight of the mound of food and was delightfully surprised at how much the fillies had crafted. "Wooow! ah can't believe y'all made so much!" Applejack said nearly about to go in a trance, her hunger rising to levels it had never been to before. Applejack then nearly jumped into the pile, which was on the floor due to the girls going overboard and making too much to properly set on the tables.
1411.title: "Help us test our food sis!"

choices: An old maneless stallion, wearing a coat of some sorts and a gleam in his eyes
A suave looking gentlecolt wearing a fedora hat,  his eyes closed and a smirk.
14111.content:
"Wow your sister can really eat Applebloom." Scootaloo said, marveling at the speed the mare was chomping down on their pile of goods. "Y-yeah..." she replied, being taken aback by how ravenous her older sis's appetite seemed to be at the moment. Even after a hard day's work A had never eaten so much, it stumped the filly as to why this sudden change in Applejack's nature had occurred, were they really that good? She pondered on this as Applejack continued her gluttonous behavior.

*half an hour later* "UUUURRRRPPPP!!! Phew, that sure was a mighty fine fill girls." Applejack lightly rubbed her swollen gut, well part of it anyway now that it was nearly twice her size. Seeing that the entire horde of food they had made was now digesting in Applejack's stomach, Sweetie Belle poked her hoof into the taut skin of the nearly spherical abdomen. "Wow, I didn't even know ponies could hold so much, I think we did better than expected." "Yeah! those spices we bought from that old pony really did the trick!" Scootaloo cheered pumping one of her hooves into the air. "Yeah, but... ah' wonder what he meant by "you'll be wanting to come back for more?" " Aw he must be some old cook with tons of old cooking secrets or something..." Scootaloo replied not really fazed by what the old stallion said. "Yeah, now come on girls we gotta make more!" Sweetie Belle said as the three ran off to get more ingredients. Applejack was now alone, able to take in her fullness in peace. "uurrrpp...ooookaaay ehh" Applejack groaned as she stumbled to get herself up. "Got...to....get...back... haaah to work! ahhh!" the pony exasperated, falling to the floor after only taking 20 steps. Oh come on AJ,, you can do this hrmmph!" Picking herself up once more she slowly made it out of the Apple family home. "Haah...haah...alright, now just gotta...buck the rest of these trees and store the apples for tomorrow's sellin'..." the farm pony realized just how difficult this would be as the mere action of walking was incredibly arduous for her. "*gulp* Well....we ain't gonna get any bits if these apples are still on the trees." Applejack trotted up to the pasture, her now softer belly dragging just slightly on the ground. Bringing her body up to one of the trees she turned around and gave a hard kick...well at least she tried to. The only thing she managed to do was knock about 7 apples, looking up she saw she had about 13 more to go. Already starting to sweat Applejack groaned knowing just how looong this was going to take.

*5 hours later* "Huff...pant...uggh...d-done." Applejack immediately fell down, covered in sweat, and nearly all of the energy in her previously was gone. Looking at the buckets she carried her apples in, she saw even with all her efforts only 5 were full the other 3 were only about a third full. "Well.." she said taking a bite out of one the apples, " it may not be mah normal amount, but, I guess it'll do, I hope Big Mac and Granny won't be too displeased with what ah got." Taking another apple from one of the buckets, the earth pony yawned as she dragged herself in for the day.

The next day Applejack was on her way to the market, now that her yesterday eating had finally been fully digested a light layer of fat rimmed her body, making a small jiggle with each step. "Well... that was a lucky break." Applejack sighed to herself as she remembered earlier how Big Macintosh questioned her on the surprisingly small amount of apples she had gotten for selling. "Erm AJ?" the large male pony asked as his sister sheepishly walked up to him, having just woken up minutes ago. "*yawn* What is it?" "Uh why are these barrels so...lackin'?" Tipping it down, the two ponies with Applejack becoming more ashamed by the second, looked down at the less than full stash of barrels "Look, I'm sorry Big Mac, I--." Applejack was about to explain she had a late night snack unusual to self and due to being half-asleep ate from her apples stored for tomorrow, but Big Macintosh out a hoof up. "Ya don't need ta explain yourself AJ, just make sure this doesn't happen again." Al-alright, thanks big brother" Applejack said in relief, glad that her brother wasn't really irritated by the lack of apples. "I'll see ya later, kay?" "Eeyup" Big Macintosh replied with his "catchphrase".

Setting her merchandise down, Applejack put up her sign declaring that she was open. "Okay! Time to make up for my folly!" Applejack said with determination. As time went on, Applejack realized she seemed to have struck gold this day, as her stash of apples were depleting faster than if Parasprites had eaten them. "Hoo boy! I can't believe how fast my apples are selling today, must be some sort of shortage around town. Seeing how many bits she had accumulated, Applejack saw it fit to take a bite from a few of left-over apples, gulping down one whole apple in the process. "Hey Applejack how's business going?" Applejack then looked up to see Twilight and Spike with a small saddlebag fitted onto the pony. "Oh, *gulp* hey Twi, Spike, it's going great! Ponies are buyin' apples like they're going extinct!" "Oh that's great!" Twilight cheerfully said, clapping her hooves together in merriment. "Say, whatch you here for anyway?" Applejack said, propping her elbow on the edge of her cart. "Oh we're here to get some food, Ol' Twilight here is becoming a glutton." Spike replied putting his hand over his mouth to non-discreetly hide his comment from the mare, chuckling in the process. Giving the baby dragon a might glare, Twilight quickly retorted. "I told you Spike, I've been studying for days! I haven't had time to eat lately! "Yeah sure, but that doesn't require you to eat out the fridge in the middle of the night and morning!" Blushing in embarrassment the pony pushed the dragon away to avoid further humiliation. "Well, we'll be seeing ya later AJ..hehe..." "Say did Applejack seem a little bigger than usual Twilight?" Spike said noticing the earth pony's increased girth. "Quiet Spike." Twilight said in a quieter manner as the two walked away.

Chuckling over the fact that the local librarian was seeming to get a sudden case of the munchies, Applejack went back to checking for any potential buyers, when out of the corner of her eye she saw a young colt with a brown coat and yellow mane slowly grasping a couple of apples in his maw. "Hey give those back ya no-good thief!" Upon being spotted, the colt sprinted into a full gallop away from the stand. Applejack then galloped off in a chase, making sure to quickly dump her bits into her saddlebags to make sure none of them got stolen while she was gone. As she gave chase Applejack found herself getting tired quite quickly, starting to lose the thief in her chase. Just as she thought he was going to get away he darted into an alley and Applejack heard an audible smashing sound coming from it. Slowing down, surprised by what possibly could've happened.

Trotting into the dark alley, she looked around for the pony. "Hey kid, you alright?" Suddenly then, Applejack saw standing over the colt who was now unconscious, in the unknown pony's hooves were her stolen apples. Looking at the pony she could see their enigmatic features beginning to be revealed to her.
14111.title: Losing control AJ?

choices: Applejack resorts to stealing from other ponies at the market!
Applejack tries  to sell her remaining foods at higher prices then usual.
141111.content:
Looking upon the figure who apparently had stopped the would be thief from stealing her apples, Applejack could see the being was an old unicorn pony. His coat was of a grayish brown color, he held no mane but looking behind one could see a moderately long spiky white tail. Despite his age, Applejack could tell from his tail color, from it's hue was not entirely due to old age. The old stallion was rather tall, almost as much as her brother Big Macintosh, though not as muscular, he still had a slight build on him. On his body he wore full body black coat of some sorts with many pockets adorning it's length. His face had quite a few wrinkles, but he still looked very full of energy and life, which was most exuberantly shown in his gold eyes, brimming with strong confidence. As Applejack looked on at the pony, she gave him her thanks.
"Whew..thank ya kindly stranger, that little varmit almost got away with some of mah valued apples." Applejack was still out of breath slightly, her belly heaving close to the ground with each exhale. "It was my pleasure miss, little hooligans such as this one should be dealt with while they're young, lest they become something worse with age." The old unicorn replied, a grave, raspy voice coming from his maw, his lips contorted into a smirk as he eyed the unconscious colt.

Taking a moment to look at the mare, the stallion asked her a question. "Hmm, I do not wish to be prudent, but you seem to be in good shape, how is it you are out of breath? I doubt this little one could've given you too much trouble to follow..." Looking to the side in an ashamed manner, Applejack had to accept she had made a dent in her physique as of late. Due to her gorging of all that food yesterday, the girl had in fact gained a little weight. It wasn't too much, 5 to 15 pounds at most, but enough to where still being unused to it, had slowed her down to the point a colt had nearly made off with a few of her profitable merchandise. Applejack took pride in her athletic abilities and it pained her knowing she was the cause of losing some of that. The mare winced, telling the honest truth.
"Actually, heh...ah've gained a little weight and that boy would've gotten away if it hadn't been fer you sir." Rubbing the back of her head in embarrassment. Frowning slightly, the old pony gave his response.
"That's too bad, but... as luck may have it, I have something on me that may do something for you..." "
Wah? Really, you got something that can keep me fit?" "You could say that." the bald pony then telekinetically pulled a small plastic bottle out from one of his coat pockets. Inside it was full with a red powder.
"This is here is a spice that will give you a huge increase in energy for a relative amount of time, and it makes a fine addition to any dish, my dear." He said giving it to mare.
"Wow...what is this stuff?"
"I'm afraid I cannot give you that information...I normally wouldn't tell anypony this but you seem honest and trustworthy, I'm an old..."spice maker" from some years ago, ago and I've recently gone back into the business to help aspiring young cooks reach their potentials... I'd tell you more my fair miss, but I'd like to keep myself away from the public, they can be rather irritating to ponies of fame." Applejack smirked at hearing this. "Aw shucks you can trust me, I won't tell anypony about ya, you can bet on that." "Haha that I can see quite well...still one cannot be too careful when dealing with secret knowledge." "Well whatever you say sir, now about this spice, do I just take a hoofful and eat it?" the old unicorn eye's gleamed with interest in the manners of this mare. "Yes, just dabble a bit onto your tongue and swallow, you should feel eager to continue your work and all the weight in the world on you won't make a difference to you."

"Well shoot, that's mighty handy...all the weight in the world" Applejack looked down at her slightly larger stomach with relief, glad that this weight of hers wasn't about to become a problem.
"Well, I best be going now, you probably have to get back to selling your wares miss. I'll be taking this one here to be dealt with." The old pony then picked up the still unconscious colt and plopped the kid onto his back. "Well alright, heh here's an apple free of charge for being so kind to me mister." Applejack then took one of the juicy red fruits out of her saddlebag and tossed it to the pony. Applejack began walking back, but turned around to say one more thing to the old stallion. "Hey! Ah almost forgot, the name's Applejack and when can ah see ya again?!" "the old pony smirked upon hearing her. "Heh don't worry, I'm sure we'll see each other again soon!" Watching the unicorn slowly walk into further into the alleyways, Applejack turned back and made her way to her stand to resume selling.

"Alright boy, time to get off..." the old stallion demanded to the colt on his back. The colt immediately opened his eyes, and slid off onto the ground. "Ha, how'd I do boss?"the young colt asked gleefully to his older peer. "You did a fine job, I think we've found a nice, good mare for our services... Applejack huh? Hehe, who'd have thought my first client in years would be one of the 6 heroines?" the old unicorn then took a large bit out of the apple he had been given earlier.

Upon returning to her stand, Applejack was relieved that none of her apples had been stolen by any other pony, despite her spending a good few minutes away from it. After about an hour or so of marketing and chatting with other sellers, one of which was a fairly new pear farmer who had just begun making her place in Ponyville's market, Applejack found herself getting rather winded, perhaps due to the heat or just feeling tired from standing all day. Remembering what that old stallion said, she took the bottle out of her bag, took off the cap with her teeth and dropped a few teaspoons of the spice onto her tongue and let it fall down her throat. Almost immediately, Applejack felt a powerful pang in her, much like the in the food she ate yesterday, albeit much stronger. "Phew! Well I'll be! this stuff sure packs a punch, I feel rarin' to go!" Applejack kicked her front hooves in the air. Finding new reserves of energy to use into goading ponies to buy her apples, Applejack sold a good 30 apples in just a short 12 minutes, at the moment she was something close to Pinkie Pie in terms of energy output. However, 3 minutes later an oddly strong feeling of hunger enveloped the mare's stomach, her belly growling for nourishment. "Ohh...shoot ah need something to eat." she said rubbing her growling gut. Knowing she didn't want to use her bits for her own services, especially when she had plenty to eat at home, Applejack decided against buying something from the market, but....she was sooo hungry." Seeing how she had she made quite a good amount of bits selling apples and apple treats this afternoon, Applejack saw nothing wrong with taking a bite out of a few of her pieces of food, after all...even if she ate some of them, she had enough to sell to make up for whatever she ate. Taking a bite out of a juicy apple fritter, Applejack moaned as she let the succulent taste of the deep-fried pastry slide down her gullet. Being reminded of days in her youth when she would come home from playing with her friends, and come to get a big plate of her granny's famous Apple fritter recipe. Loving the taste so much, Applejack had another... and another and then she just moved onto to her other treats when all the fritters were gone.

"BBBUUURRRRPPPP!!!" Applejack loudly belched as she groggily brought her head up from the wooden stand, having rested it as she ate just prior. "Oooh...sheesh gotta give it to that old unicorn, Ah think ah just gained an extra 20 pounds, ah still don't feel heavy but,...ah guess it doesn't help with full stomachs...how much did ah eat?" Peering into the boxes of her stand she winced as she saw just how much she had truly eaten. Looking into them, the pony could see that there was only a hoofful of treats left, nowhere near accountable to how many bits she had made, something she'd have to explain once she got back home. "Oh nelly, Granny Smith and Big Mac are gonna have a fit over this..." Applejack bit her lip as she worried for her fate back at the farm. Then she got an idea, if she could get a hold of some more bits, she could make it seem like all the stuff had been bought. Still feeling the effects of the spice, Applejack decided one way or another she'd have to find some bits...
141111.title: An enigmatic old pony appears.

choices: Swallow the powder! She needs to work, plus it tastes really good!
She can prove she's still strong without that fancy spice, go on without it.
1411111.content:
"Well...I ain't gonna go home with this amount of bits to Granny." Applejack said to herself, with hint of guilt in her tone. Trotting about the market, Applejack scanned the area for any easy steals. Unfortunately, a lot of the ponies seemed to be using a chests with locks and keys for their sale income, which would be, to put it mildly, rather difficult to steal. "Oohh come on, there's gotta somepony not being savvy today." Looking around a bit more, the mare stumbled upon a mare inside a tent selling tomatoes, looking just a bit older than herself, and more importantly... a huge sack of bits standing just behind the pony and her counter. "Alright...here I go..." Applejack sneaked up to the stash of golden coins, making sure nopony, especially the tomato seller, noticed her. "It'll just be a few, she won't even notice." Applejack muttered to herself as she reached her jaws outward to the pile of bits. Taking a mouthful of bits, eying the mare a few feet from her, who by an extreme amount of luck on her side, was not garnering any potential buyers for her fruit. Bit after bit was put into Applejack's satchels. ( I don't believe it, she's just standing there! She'll never make business if she's isn't wary of stunts like this...I better take more to teach her a lesson...)

Applejack then continued her thievery of the seller's hardworked money, going from "just a few" to "more then necessary". Putting in five more bits into her bag, Applejack looked back into the bag, noticing...it was empty. (Wow, I worked pretty fast in 5 minutes...Alright now to move back slowly...) Applejack thought as she crept out from behind the tent, slipping out with over 80 bits. "Hehe...this is more then enough to satisfy Granny and Big Macintosh." As she walked back to her own stand, however something popped up in front of her. "Applejack! What do you think yer doing?!" What stood in front of the mare was a small, robe wearing, winged version of herself, her front hooves crossed, adorned with a small halo over her hat. "What do you mean what I'm doing, and who are you?" Applejack questioned to the floating angel pony. "Who do you think ah' am, I'm your good conscience ! Y'know the thing that stops ya from doing bad stuff, what made you the element of honesty! What do you think yer doing, AJ, stealing hard earned bits from another pony, you know how hard it is to make your own pay every now and then, why would you steal from another seller?"
"Hey lay off will ya, you stupid feather brain!" Suddenly, a red clothed, horned version of Applejack appeared in a puff of smoke, holding a pitchfork in her hooves. "If Applejack wants to steal some money, let her, it's that mare's fault for not being careful, besides she's got things to pay for at home, and she needs to get money anyway possible." The two sides of Applejack's conscience trotted towards each other, with visible hatred leering from their eyes. "You think Sweet ol Granny and big brother will like the fact that one of their kin STOLE a pony's entire stash of bits, because she herself ate her own wares?!"
"You think they'll enjoy not having MONEY?! I don't know about ya sister, but I ain't going back with our crappy 20 bits!" Deviljack then shoved her pitchfork into Angeljack's torso. At this point Applejack was groaning and stuttering, drawing bits of attention to herself from other ponies, as she grabbed her head in frustration, in pain from the internal turmoil going in her head. "Applejack is NOT a thief, you're nothin' but a horrid part of her that's trying to lead her to ruin, and you won't win!" Angeljack bucked into Deviljack's body, using her halo as a dagger sort of weapon. "Says you! I got me an ace this time, you halo wearin', weak pansy!" Deviljack then took out a small vial, holding the same red powder that Applejack possessed. Dumping the contents into her mouth, she then morphed into a muscular, demonic, black pony devil, sporting a fiery mane and sharp, crimson eyes. "Wh-what the hay?!" Angeljack screamed as Deviljack consumed her in a wave of fiery darkness. "Gaaahhh!" Applejack's eyes opened, her pupils now quite dilated, the residual effects of something akin to a headache slowly going away. Pulling out the vial, Applejack, like her bad conscience did, poured a teaspoon of the powder onto her tongue, it's powerful pang of flavor filled her insides the moment she ingested it. "Ooohh, that really helps me after that...whatever that was." Applejack said, trying to explain what she had experienced. Rubbing her forehead, the pony took a look at her bag of bits and her own cash she had earned, and decided it was time to go home, not much use staying at the market with no food to sell, and it'd be unwise to try and steal more now, considering it'd be suspicious if she were to be caught stealing.

"Heya everypony! I'm back!" Applejack exclaimed, opening the front door to her abode at evening. "Ohh sis! How'd ya do today?!" Applebloom asked as she ran up to her older sister, running past her brother, who was slowly trudging up to her as well. "See for yerself!" Applejack dropped her chest of bits to the floor, letting it thud heavily on the wooden base. "Over a hundred bits! Wow you sure did a hay's good sellin' today, right Big Mac?"
"Eeyup." Applejack chuckled, happy that she had made her family happy.
"So, where's Granny Smith?"
"Over there." Big Mac pointed to the sleeping old mare in a nearby rocking chair. "Ah well...ah guess ah can tell tomorrow... well I'm beat, I'll be heading ta bed now y'all." "Aw, but sis, you just got home, ah wanted ya taste a few more sweets I made with Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo today!" "Aw shucks, don't worry Applebloom, I'll be sure to eat whatever you've made tomorrow for breakfast!" "G'night you two!" "Night!" her two siblings said in response. "G'night Granny." Applejack whispered to the sleeping, old mare, rubbing her head with her hoof. Applejack then made her way up to her bedroom, a sleeping Winoa layed in her basket. Placing her bag on stand, the vial fell as she moved it, landing in sheets. As Applejack fell asleep, changes to her body began, a latent effect of the pure, undiluted powder. Her body began to get bigger, adipose rapidly began to develop. Applejack grew and grew throughout the night, developing a second chin and quite a few folds, her small potbelly she had earlier the other day had turned into a full blown fold ridden gut.

"Ugh oh, phew... I haven't slept that good in ages, well better get up to start early morning buckin'..." Applejack yawned as she stretched her body in bed, leaning over to get out of bed, she suddenly found herself crashing to the floor, waking her dog WInoa. "Uggh! Wh-what the?!" Applejack groggily wriggled about, eventually bringing herself up. "How'd I get so fat?" the pony muttered as her dog, surprised at her mistress's new size, pawed at the pony's mass of a belly. "Don't worry Winoa it's still me...all of me." she looked to her sides, wondering how this would fare with her duties on the farm, and of course how her family and friends would take this new development on her body. "Hey Applejack what was that nois--woah." Applebloom burst open her sister's door, Applejack winced as her sister saw her flabby body. "What happened to you?" Applebloom walked over and poked her hoof into a lower belly fold, "I...I don't know, now come on don't poke me like that, it's feeling weird." "Well...okay, let's just get morning work done with before we go into this." Applebloom trotted off, going down to tell Big Mac AJ was up and ready to go, and also that she might be a little slow today. Bringing herself downstairs, the mare embarrassingly showed herself to her family. "Uhh good morin' everypony." Granny Smith and Big Macintosh's jaws dropped at the sight of Applejack's frame. "Why child...what in blazes happened to ya last night?! Ya look like ya ate a whole two tree's worth uh apples!" "I'll talk about this later, right now I gotta get to work, okay Granny? Now, come on Big Mac, those trees aren't gonna buck themselves. Applejack deadpanned as she waddled out to the field, the stallion still at a lost for words, nodded and followed suit.

"Alright!" AJ reared as she galloped towards the first tree. Picking up her hind legs she slammed her hooves into the tree. Which due to her increased weight and fat, did nothing but send ripples throughout her blubber. "Pfft hehe..." Big Macintosh couldn't help but laugh over his sister's attempt at bucking, it was a funny sight to see his sister jiggle so wildly, even if it meant she couldn't work properly. "Don't laugh at me!...I'll show him." Applejack then remembered that vial of powder, that old stallion said it could make all the weight in the world meaningless to ya. "Did I bring it with me?" Applejack fiddled around in her folds, thinking it might've fell in there last night since she take her bag off, remembering it fell onto her bed right before she fell asleep. Searching around, Applejack found it stuck between two large folds underneath her belly button. "Ah ha!" but as she took hold of it, Applejack felt something... a small thought that told her not to do this.
1411111.title: Applejack the theif. (sorry title sucks I know)

choices: "Do you think you can give me a discount, just once?""
14111111.content:
Feeling this slight restraint inside her head, Applejack hesitated for a moment. True she absolutely needed to bring down apples to bring in income for her family, but would it be right to do so using this fancy spice? Something was telling her this wouldn't be right. Then out from a hellish portal on Applejack's shoulder, somewhat bruised and exhausted, came the angelic Applejack. "AJ, stop...guuuh d-don't use it, it ain't right!"
"GET BACK HERE!" from inside the portal roared a deep, distorted voice sounding vaguely like Applejack, suddenly a large claw that looked more like a disfigured hoof reached out from the hellfire, entrapping Angeljack in it's grasp, pulling her back towards the portal. the voice called out again, this time to Applejack herself. "Hey listen, use that stuff here girl, show our brother what you're really capable of!" the portal then faded away, leaving the mare to stare once more at the vial of powder. Looking down at her wobbly gut, and at her brother who was hard at work, having bucked a good 5 barrels of apples in the minute or so she had been dealing with her consciences. Taking the cork out, spatting it into a small fold underneath her left foreleg, Applejack dumped over half the remaining contents left in the vial, leaving about one more gulp. "Alright, that should be enough for the day." Applejack's eyes dilated slightly, her body full of vigor.

Big Macintosh lifted his right hind leg, striking the trunk with a powerful buck, the resulting vibrations traveled up through the tree to it's crown, shaking off all the juicy, red apples from it. Looking down, the stallion found that one of the apples had missed the barrel, reaching down to grab it with his teeth, his ears perked upon hearing the excited shouting of his younger sister. "YEE-HAW!!" Galloping towards a nearby tree, Applejack swiftly and gracefully rotated her body, swinging her hind legs towards the tree, she bucked it with immense vigor. The force from the kick, sent a loud resonating WHACK through the air. A bundle of leaves fell alongside the bunch of apples. Her kick left a noticeable indent in tree's bark. Big Macintosh was so surprised by AJ's sudden show of energy that he dropped the apple in his teeth. "Come on Big Mac, we got work to do!" Applejack shouted to her brother, noticing his awestruck status. Regaining his composure, the pony simply nodded, smiling at his sister's lively attitude. Even this sudden and mysterious weight gain she had acquired couldn't stop the spirit of the Apple Family, though he had to wonder just how did she get so....rotund overnight, it puzzled him, but he thought best to leave that kind of thinking for later, he had work to do.

As the two working ponies continued their bucking, with Applejack working at a faster speed then her brother, with equal power, she was proving to be quite an asset today. Kicking and thwacking every tree with a powerful thrust of her legs, Applejack and Big Macintosh had finished their morning work in record time, only 2 hours and 26 or so minutes. "Well looks like we're done huh Big Macintosh?"
"Eeyup." the stallion replied, agreeing with her.
"Yep, good thing I had this tasty spice here, gave me a heck of a boost with it's taste." Applejack then pulled out the vial.
"Hmmm..." Big Macintosh stared the vial, curious of this spice. Taking it in his hoof, he opened up the vial and poured a tiny bit onto his tongue. "Bleh!" the red stallion, wiped his tongue of the stuff, his face contorted into one of disgust.
"Woah, Big Mac? What's wrong?" AJ said swiping the vial from him.
"Too strong." he said, still wiping his tongue of the strong spice.
"Heh heh, well Ah'll check back with ya for the rest of the fields later today, I'm gonna go around town for a bit." Applejack trotted off, waving goodbye to her brother.

Making her way to the marketplace, Applejack smiled as she took pleasure in the livelihood of the ponies around her. "Applejack?" hearing her named being called, the mare turned around to meet with a familiar face, two faces actually.
"Ah well howdy Twilight, Spike, what brings you two here?" the purple mare and baby dragon looked on at their friend with slack jaws, Spike started to giggle a bit, but was soon stopped by a quick glare of his friend. "Oh we just came here to pick up some mints for Spike and a few other things, his breath has been getting more worse then usual..." Twilight said waving her hoof in front of her snout.
"Hey!" Spike angrily snapped at the mare, embarrassed and irritated by the statement.
"But more importantly, Applejack what happened to you...you look so...so..."
"Fat?" the dragon interrupted with his blunt comment. He then winced in slight pain as Twilight whacked him on the head with her hoof.
Applejack blushed, she knew this would happen sooner or later. "Well...to be honest, Ah'm not sure, just kinda woke up like this."
"You...just woke up with all this extra weight? Hmm..." Twilight veered her head closer to get look at the flab on the orange mare. Poking it gently, she saw it bob and shake slightly from the touch, it was indeed....fat.
"Yep...aw but it ain't no biggie, I did all my morning buckin' with Big Mac in record time!" Applejack then felt a pang in her head, a need to fill herself. Taking out the vial she once again dumped the contents onto her tongue and swallowed. "Ah...that really hits the spot."
"Hey Applejack where'd ya get that stuff?" Spike pointed to the now empty vial, it's insides now filled with nothing but the faint remnants of the red powder.
"Oh I got it at the market from some old pony yesterday, some sort of super tasty spice."
"Really? I've never seen that kind of stuff before...can you tell me where to find some of that, I'd love to try it, maybe with a daffodil sandwich."
"Oh well...actually I don't know where to find the guy who gave me this, he didn't give me any info on that." As she said this, she again lifted the vial, expecting to feel the wonderful sensation of taste of that powder once again, but felt nothing.
"Huh?" "W-where is it?" Applejack shook it up and down, trying to see if some would fall out.
"Uhh Applejack, you ate it all, it's empty." Twilight said in a half amused half confused manner. Applejack, realizing this, started to get a little nervous.
"Oh...well darn, I uhh oh sheesh I gotta go to the...little filly's room, yeah! I'll see ya'll later!" Applejack ran off past the two, leaving them bewildered by the pony's sudden worry. "AJ wait!...Guess it's urgent."
"Applejack needs to stop eating all that powder, did you see how big she got?"
"Oh stop it Spike, there's no way a vial that size could hold ANYTHING capable of doing that to a pony's body overnight. still...I wonder just how she got like that in the first place, I think I'll go and check with Sweet Apple Acres later, now come on, let's go find you some mints, that breath of yours is getting awful."
"Ugghh!" Spike crossed his arms, pouting as the continued their trek through the market.

Darting past several alleys, Applejack searched for any pony who looked similar to the old stallion. Knowing he didn't like being seen in public, she figured she could find him by going to some place similar to when she first met him. After about 2 hours of running around rampant, the mare was starting to feel rather winded, all the energy gone, she felt very heavy. Stopping to rest in an alley away from the hassle of the market, she stood against a wall to rest."*gasp....huuaah...Hoo boy, I sure wish I had some of that powder, I...." At that moment Applejack felt a pang in her belly, a low rumbling emitted from it, in seconds, the pony let out a rather massive belch, odd given her lack of eating today, beside the powder from before. "BBBUUURRRPPP!!!!" As she did though, something crazy happened, Applejack began to get fatter...much fatter. Her form expanded a good foot from her body, a large belly began to form and developed into segmented rolls, the mare developed a second and third chin, both them flopped violently as they bulged out from her neck. Her legs bulged with layers of flab. After a few seconds, the gaining stopped Applejack stood there, well over 350lbs, in an abandoned alleyway. "W-what in the hay?! she said in panic, wondering what had happened.
"Oh dear...Miss Applejack, you don't seem to be in the best of shapes." a gravely voice called out to her, from around a corner appeared the old stallion once again, a look of concern and worry adorned his face.
"Oh sir, am Ah glad to see you!, you got any more of that spice?"
"Don't worry child, I have plenty, but...it puzzles me....how did you become like this in only a day's time?" he put his hoof to his chin as he said this.
"Ah well...I don't know sir, it just kinda happened in my sleep and well...just now actually.
"Hmm pity, well I'm sure you'll find a way around it." He then turned around to leave.
"Wait! Uhh Mister, aren't you gonna give me some more powder?"
"Hmm? Oh yes...100bits."
"Pardon?" Applejack questioned, not understanding him.
"One hundred bits...for this much." Out from his coat pocket, the stallion pulled out a small plastic bag, holding around 5 times the amount the vial held.
"1-100?! That spice is good, but I didn't think it'd be that pricey!"
"Well you're getting a lot more and this is very expensive to make, even an amount like this costs a fortune to produce.
"But...I...I don't have that much with me." Applejack looked down with worry.
"Such a shame...oh well, goodbye Miss Applejack." the old stallion put the bag back, and turned around again.
"WAIT!" Applejack shouted.
14111111.title: The power of the spice shows itself.

choices: Applejack meets Pinkie Pie of all ponies on her way,  Pinkie is in the contest

141111111.content:
"I...I can get more, just give me some time." Applejack's eyes darted around immediately thinking of places or ways of where she could find a hundred bits in short amount of time. Her belly wobbled as she darted off.
"Boss!" the young colt from before trotted up the old unicorn; in his mouth he held a small pouch. "I got the stuff like you asked!"
"Ahh...good job Rascal," The old stallion opened up the pouch, revealing a kind of powder similar to that which he had given to Applejack, however this one had a strong purple tint to it. "With this, control over Miss Applejack and essentially the Elements of Harmony will be mere foal's play."
"Yeah...but...uhhh Boss, I've been thinkin', why exactly did you give that first batch of yours to those three fillies? I mean...that seemed kind of risky." the small brown colt then readjusted his Gatsby.
"When you’ve been around as long as I’ve have you know that for any good plan to come to fruition, you must first disperse a few “tests”…and you also learn how to cover your tracks if need be. Now come on, let’s get back to base, I bet Runner and Sunshine Spark are waiting for you.”
“Right,” Rascal smiled.

Making their way into the outer parts of Ponyville, going through old, abandoned alleyways, into the less populated areas, the two ponies walked into a large warehouse that by all means looked unused and unfit to be the abode for anypony, in other words the perfect hideout for the old stallion and his group. Going down the creaky and dusty staircase, Rascal and the Boss entered the basement, pushing open an ironclad door that had been made by one of the ponies inside.

“How’s your pawn doing so far old man?” a grayish blue, wavy maned, bespectacled young unicorn with a snarky disposition called from behind himself as he mixed and combined various potions and ingredients in bowls and test tubes.
“Now is that anyway to talk to your elders Magus?” he said with a slight chuckle.
“Master Mastermind!” a young beige coated, scarlet maned, Pegasus wearing a navy blue hoodie ran up to the old stallion. “Is your glorious plan finally starting to fruition?” the mare squealed as she pranced on her hooves. The spectacled stallion frowned at her display of admiration for his superior.

“To answer the both of you, they are going well… with one of the Element Bearers out of commission, the monotony of Equestria will be forever gone, and this country will finally see the truth.”
“Rascal!” Suddenly two other children ran up to the colt. A light yellow pegasus with a short jagged mane, the other was a cobalt blue unicorn with a mane that resembled that of a porcupine.
“How was your first time out with the Boss?” Sunshine Spark asked with eagerness.
“Did you do really cool stuff like what Magus and Scarlet Flower do outside?”
“Nothing much, but I did help get Boss his first customer in years! And it was Applejack one of the Elements of Harmony!”
“Wow, she’s really important, He must be really proud of you.”

“Of course he is Shiny; otherwise he wouldn’t be so happy. Look at him.” Runner then pointed a hoof at the old stallion, who had been occupied with conversing with Magus over something. The old stallion had a confident smirk strewn across his face; his brow was angled downward showing arrogance and maliciousness, however the young ponies could not fully realize this kind of body language and merely saw the smile on his face.

“…Have you finished the potion yet Magus?”
“No, since I don’t have any proper test subjects and since we plan for this to be used in the town’s water supply; it’s getting rather arduous to determine what works and what doesn’t. I can only use these lab rats here…but so far it only last for a few hours, an entire town of ponies with the current combination we have, would only be effected for just under an hour, and that’s if they all got effected at the exact same time.” Magus looked over at the group of white mice; they were rather obese and lethargic, different from the stuff that had been given to Applejack in that hers was made to induce weight gain instantly after a set of time had passed ranging from 5 to 10 hours and it also worked to heighten and cause adrenaline, with an addiction to the powder as well if enough was devoured. Previous samples like the amount given to the earth pony were not planned to have this kind of effect, but given how energetic some of the rats and Applejack had become after consumption, it made them easy to manipulate into wanting more. These newer concoctions were crafted only to induce weight gain and make the consumer lethargic, which would allow for an easy takeover.

“Hmm…well continue working on it, as long as I’ve got Applejack in my hooves, the Elements of Harmony will be effectively disabled. “Scarlet Flower, come, I have a task for you.” The beige mare face beamed with bliss as she heard her master’s words.
“Of course Master Mastermind!” Scarlet Flower followed the stallion outside, bouncing up the steps with child-like glee.
“Tch…so annoying, Master Mastermind…” Magus gritted his teeth as he continued his work for the old stallion, his nostrils flaring, making the trio of foals laugh at his over the top facial expression.


“There’s just gotta be someplace I can find some bits…I…I need that powder!” Applejack whispered to herself as she ran across Ponyville, looking around for anyplace, anyway to get some quick cash. Her rotund body was making it difficult to get around, and it also got her a large amount of stares, so her earlier actions of theft weren’t a viable option anymore. Going from place to place, seeing anypony had some kind of immediate odd job that needed to be done, and while she did surprisingly find someponies needing help, her bulky flab made her rather inept as help. “Maybe you should try an eating contest if you want some quick money hehe, I hear there’s supposed to be a pie eating one tomorrow, with how big you are you’ll probably do great haha!.” One of the ponies she had met with told of her, and though it was rather rude in it’s meaning, it did offer her at least a way to get some bits. “An eating contest…Oh but I need some money to enter in the first place!” Applejack grunted as she read the flyer she had found after speaking with the pony from before. Realizing something, she ran back home to get her entry fee.

She saw a young and attractive unicorn with a fedora hat. His fur is pure white while his mane and tail consist of black and blue strips. Glory Sweet was praising the tartarus out of her as if she was a princess.

"Ah think ah just gained some weight," rubbing the back of her head with embarrassment as she supposed to be fit who does all the athletic stuff.

Applejack rushed back to her cart to continue selling her produce. She sells a good amount of her product before she feel a strong feeling in her stomach.
She was incredibly hungry. Applejack thought to herself that she could wait until dinner time but the rumbling from her stomach disturbed her and the ponies around her. She clutched her stomach, begging for her stomach to stop. However her stomach kept rumbling for food. She does not know what to do. If she eat the food, her family will be having a fit. If she doesn't, she could not maintain her composure and continue selling her apples. What should she do?

"Nice seeing you again," Applejack looked up from the produce and find Glory Sweet.
"Hey," Applejack was full of joy meeting him again, "The spice really does the trick. I feel like I can buck every tree in my farm all by myself."
"I told it would work," he pulled out a bag of bits and hoof it to Applejack, "I want to pay for the rest of the food, keep the change."
Applejack was clearly surprise how he just bought everything in one fell swoop.
"Do ya want it to be deliver or.." Applejack was cut off as Sweet Glory shook his head.

The colt agreed and continue on his merry way.

14111211.content:
Luckily nopony noticed her coming back home and comment about her weight. It was getting late and needed a good night sleep. Applejack put her hat on one of the bedpost and hid the powder under the mattress.

During the night, Applejack weight increases like bread dough rising in an oven. Her small belly became a large gut. She gained a double chin. Huge cheeks that make her face look adorable and her butt that now take up two seats. Applejack didn't notice what was happening to her body overnight. If Applejack was awake, she would describe it as the best sleep she had in a while.

When morning come, Applejack woke up and removed the blanket off her.
"This is the best dang sleep ah've ever had," Applejack rolled off her bed and slammed heavily on the ground, "What the heck just happen?"
Applejack looked all over her body and found she gained a lot of weight overnight. She could not think what could cause this to happen. However the middle of her thought was interrupted for the desire for more the red powder hidden under her mattress.
"Today's a long day. Need more powder to power through the day," Applejack flipped over the mattress and took out the vial.
She took another couple of teaspoons of the powder, "Hooey! That's hit the spot. I feel like I could buck the whole apple orchard."
Applejack hid the vial under her hat and went down to see her family at the table having breakfast.

At the table, Applejack's family were shock to see her.
"What happen to you Applejack?" asked Applebloom curiously on how she could gain so much weight in one day.
"Look like you've just eaten the whole apple family feast all by yourself!" Granny Smith finished serving all the meals to the family.
"Not sure but don't worry. A working mare like me can work off this fat like butter melting in the sun," Applejack dismissed the stares from her family and took her seat at the table. The chair groaned under the weight of her.
It was a sight to see Applejack finished her meal within only a minute. It usually takes her at least 10 minutes to finish her meal when she was in a hurry. It was like her didn't have anything to eat yesterday.
"Ah'm taking the produce to the market. See you later," Applejack left the table and went to the cart.
"Okay. Ah've gained a bit of weight. Just need to widen the straps and off I go," Applejack widen the straps to make it fit on her. It was a bit tight but it done its business.

As she was setting the apple stand, many ponies were commenting about her weight behind her back. Nopony dared to ask her why she gained so much weight as she was a farmer and an athlete. They don't want to upset her and be bucked. Applejack continued her business like usual and once again met Twilight Sparkle and Spike.
"Hey Applejack," Twilight tried to start a conversation without offending her, "I would like another bushel of apples."
"Sure thing Twi," Applejack picked a basket of apples to Twilight.

"Do you know what cause this?" Twilight was really curious about Applejack's new weight.
Applejack tried to think of something, she first thought it could be the powder but it couldn't have effect her that much.
"Not really sure. Sorry about that," Applejack went back to her business selling apples.

Applejack heard the whisper from Spike, "From a distance I swear she is like a cow but orange."

Applejack continued as business. When nopony was looking she took out the vial and swallow the rest of the red powder.
"That's much better. Ah hope that Glory bring more of the red powder."
After selling all the produce, Applejack went to the same alleyway where she first met Glory Sweet.
"Ah hope he is coming today," Applejack was impatient for more of that red powder.
Then something strange happen.
Applejack loudly burped, "What the? I've only had breakfast."
Applejack body just blew up in fat. Her belly just grew so big that there are belly rolls and at least an inch off the ground while standing, her butts now take up three seats, and gained another chin. Applejack sat on her hunch and examined her body. Her belly touch the ground while sitting.

~~~


An orange earth pony trotted briskly up to the Carousel Boutique. With her head held as high as an elephant's eye, she looked confident and proud, like she was daring the world to just try to mess with her. But even her spunky aura wasn't enough to stop a few strange looks amongst the ponies. This mare was no fashionista, and had only been to the boutique about four times, and only on legitimate business expeditions. So why was she going now?

Regardless of her peer's quizzical faces, the pony gazed at the lavish door of the boutique. She took the rope hanging down in her teeth and pulled. Somewhere inside, a bell rang. "Just a momeeeent!" said a sing-songy voice. The pony at the front door stood patiently as a glistening white unicorn opened the door.

"Why, hello there, Applejack, darling! What brings you here?" said the unicorn.

Alright, sugar, you can do this, just tell her how you feel, thought Applejack, but before she could say anything, she was whisked into the boutqiue.

"Oh, Applejack, you simply must try on this new shirt, it will look absolutely ravishing with your color palette," said Rarity, sorting through her racks. She picked out a cream colored blouse and levitated it over to Applejack. "Oh... dear... perhaps a bit too frilly... no matter, I'll just cut out the lace, add some starched collars... oh! And red buttons, oh you could simply die -"

"Ah appreciate it, Rares, but ah'm here fer a different reason," said Applejack. This is it, sugar, she thought.

"What's that, dear? Oh, I am so sorry, I cut you right off, didn't I? Please, what were you going to say?" Rarity turned around and batted her eyelashes. Whoa nelly, thought the earth pony.

"Ah came here, to, uh..."

"To...?"

"To, ask if... y..." Applejack started to sweat. Ask if you want to have dinner with me. It's not that difficult, sugar.

"Ask if I? Spit it out, darling."

Shoot, she's gettin' impatient. "Ask if you wanna ha..."

"You came to ask if I want help? Help with what?"

"Help with... preparin' food fer yer upcomin' social, yeah! Y'all will need somethin' to feed yer guests, and ah'm here on behalf of Sweet Apple Acres t' offer our top-notch services fer yer parties!" Applejack grinned far too widely. Celestia Damnit, Applejack.

"You want to cater for my socials? Oh, Applejack, you are simply a gem! Pinkie Pie wanted to help, but I need something a little more substantial than cupcakes - oh, you are a lifesaver!" Rarity threw her hooves around the earth pony, who was redder than the apples on her rump. Perhaps this trip wasn't such a waste, after all.

"Aw, shoot, Rares, y'all know ah'd do anything t' help a friend in need," said Applejack.

Rarity let go and looked at Applejack contemplatively. "What do you say we meet tomorrow for lunch, and you can tell me all about the fabulous recipes you'll prepare for me... in the meantime, I still think that blouse will look smashing on you..." Rarity gasped and her eyes twinkled. "Puffed shoulders, that's it!"

Applejack stood by awkwardly while Rarity rummaged through her stocks, finding different things to improve the shirt. "Ah'll just... be goin' now..."

"Yes, see you tomorrow, sweetheart!" said Rarity, barely paying attention. Applejack backed out of the shop, then turned around, grinning ear to ear.

Sweetheart. Well, maybe this wasn't such a waste of time after all.

So please......take a break from the chores and join us at the spa. After all, your chores won't be going anywhere."

Upon hearing what Rarity had said to her, Applejack knew that the fashionista mare did raise some absolutely valid points. After all, she might be one of the strongest ponies in Ponyville, probably one of the strongest in Equestria, but even she was well aware of her limitations, since the blubbery earth pony still remembers the whole incident that occurred when she restlessly tried to buck every apple tree in Sweet Apple Acres due to Big Mac's injury, which resulted in Applejack becoming exhausted, causing her to create several incidents, including making Pinkie Pie and numerous other ponies having food poisoning, scaring the living daylights out of a bunch of baby bunnies when she was aiding Fluttershy, and of course, the misfired launch of Rainbow Dash when she was attempting some new stunts to impress the Wonderbolts.

Needless to say, Applejack was already quite aware of her limits. So, left with little to no choice, especially when it came to Rarity's persistence, Applejack let out a somewhat defeated sigh, then looked back at the fashionista mare and said, "....Alright, Rarity. Ya' win, Ah....Ah'll go with ya' and Fluttershy to da spa." 151111.content:
Rarity strained to pull the corset tighter. She just couldn't imagine where this extra weight had come from. Why, she'd been so busy recently that she hadn't even had time to eat!

Well, that wasn't exactly true. She had been able to grab a quick snack here and there, so she hadn't starved to death. But making herself a good, healthy meal took time, and time was one thing she hadn't had the last few weeks. As soon as she'd heard that Marie Quinn, owner of the largest modeling company in Equestria, was coming to Ponyville, she had kicked her ordinarily hectic schedule into overdrive. She didn't want a repeat of that whole Photo Finish mess, so she'd decided that she would model her designs herself this time.

Unfortunately, the snack food she'd been sustaining herself with had taken a bit of a toll on her waistline, and she wasn't going to be able to get into any of her best outfits if she didn't manage to tighten...this...corset! She certainly couldn't let Marie Quinn see her like this; she'd die of embarrassment!

If Rarity had been paying attention to her waistline, she would have known better than to start getting dressed with barely a half-hour before Marie Quinn was due to arrive. But then again, if she'd had time to pay attention to things like that, she wouldn't be in this situation in the first place. She could hear the corset strings strain and groan against her little belly, even as she pulled harder at them with magic and teeth both.
151111.title: Getting Ready for Marie Quinn

choices: MQ suggests that Rarity gain some weight
MQ offers Rarity a different job
1511111.content:
It took quite a bit of doing, but Rarity managed to get the corset laced tight enough to disguise the pooch of her belly and slip into one of her favorite outfits just in time to make it look, when Marie Quinn walked into her shop, that she hadn't spent the last half-hour panicking. Her corset was so tight that she could barely breathe, but that was a price she was willing to pay. She looked great, comfort be damned.

Marie Quinn, though she was the head of a modeling firm, didn't look like a model herself. She was shorter and heavier than Rarity, and her blonde mane was piled in a high bouffant. That particular manestyle would have looked terrible on most ponies, but Marie Quinn pulled it off through sheer confidence. Rarity had struggled to look her best; Marie Quinn

"Welcome!" Rarity said, much more breathily than she'd intended. She wasn't used to talking with all the air squeezed out of her lungs.

"Thank you," Marie Quinn replied, looking around the shop."I was told that you make all these clothes yourself. Is that accurate?" The blonde was curt but polite, and Rarity knew enough about the fashion business to be grateful for that.

"Of course," she said as brightly as she could manage. "Everything you see here is my original creation."

"So, tell me, why would a talented fashion designer like yourself--" Marie Quinn just called her talented! Rarity was pretty sure that her sudden urge to faint was due to excitement, not a lack of oxygen. "--want to work as a model?"

"Oh, being a model is my dream!" Rarity exclaimed. "All the glamor, all the excitement! It's just the most wonderful job in the world! Of course, I adore designing, but one only has a short window in which one can become a model."

"Well, I am looking for a new model for a big upcoming campaign," Marie Quinn said, "but I'm afraid you're a bit thinner than what I'm looking for." Rarity swayed on her hooves, her vision going momentarily fuzzy with shock (or maybe that was the lack of oxygen again). After all the hard work she'd put into making herself presentable, she was too thin!? She couldn't very well rip the corset off and show Marie Quinn her stomach, and besides, as soon as her schedule went back to normal, she was going to work the weight off.

"Isn't there anything I could do?" she whined. She had been so excited when Marie Quinn made a special trip to scout her...it couldn't just end like this.
1511111.title: Making a Thin Impression

choices: Rarity gained less weight than MQ expected
Rarity gained more weight than MQ expected
15111111.content:
"You are a lovely pony," Marie Quinn said, "and I would hate to have come out here for nothing..." She raised a hoof to her mouth in thought, and Rarity waited for her decision with bated breath--or, at least, as much breath as she could bate in her current state. "I can give you the job if you'd be willing to gain a bit of weight. By the look of your build, you'd fill out nicely. Exactly the sort of pony I'm looking for." She must have been able to read the shock on Rarity's face, because she added, "Otherwise, you don't really fit in with the campaign I have in mind."

Rarity was taken aback. She absolutely hadn't considered this possibility. Why should she have? Before this moment, she had never heard of a job that required a model to gain weight. What's more, she wasn't sure she could do it. She put a lot of work into keeping up her appearance, and doing anything but keeping herself as trim as possible felt utterly foreign to her. In fact, she was holding back a shudder at the mere thought of it.

On the other hand, she would probably never get another chance like this...

"I'll do it," she said finally.

Marie Quinn nodded. "Excellent. You know your body, so I'll leave you to your own devices for, hm, two weeks, and then we'll see how you're doing. "Welcome to Mare Quinn Modeling, Rarity." They shook hooves, and just like that, Marie Quinn was gone, and Rarity was left with the enormity of the choice she had just made.

The first thing she did, of course, was to undo her corset and take several deep, calming breaths. It felt fantastic to be able to breathe normally again. When she no longer felt faint, Rarity examined her stomach in the mirror. It was noticeably bigger than she was used to, but not a lot--she doubted anyone who wasn't paying close attention would notice. All the same, she was happy to have a bit of a head start on gaining.

Rarity's plan for the next fortnight was simple: since she'd started gaining weight by being too busy to watch her eating habits, she would try to keep up the same hectic schedule, but keep a better supply of fattening food available.

Having extra food around seemed to do the trick. Over the next two weeks, Rarity found herself grazing on sweets even when she wasn't exactly hungry, and she was doing her best not to be horrified by that. Oh, it wasn't so bad during the day, when she could munch and work without really thinking. At night, though, she had entirely too much time to think about what she was doing to herself. Only by constantly reassuring herself that she was only doing this to land a great modeling career, and that she'd certainly be able to drop the weight afterwards, was she able to keep going.

Two weeks later, Marie Quinn returned to the shop.
15111111.title: What Would You Do for a Modeling Gig?

choices: Rarity reaffirms MQ that she can gain weight by herself
MQ puts Rarity on a diet regimen
151111111.content:
Rarity was a bundle of nerves as she paced through her shop's front room, waiting for Marie Quinn to arrive. The unicorn would have described herself as "too nervous to even eat," but that was untrue: her pacing orbit took her between every single one of the treat dishes she had stashed around, and whenever she passed one, she snatched a few goodies to try and settle her nervous stomach.

In point of fact, she was nervous about her stomach, and she hardly knew if she was coming or going. One the one hoof, her added chubbiness (which had settled mostly around her stomach and flanks) still didn't sit right with her. The little belly that had been barely noticeable two weeks ago had grown into something that drew the occasional astonished stare, though her friends either hadn't noticed or were too polite to say anything. It still wasn't very big, if she looked at it objectively, no more than an extra inch or two, but the reality hardly mattered when she felt like fat hog, did it?

On the other hoof, though, getting a contract with Marie Quinn could change her whole life. Surely the glamorous life of a model was worth putting up with her awful belly, and of course Marie Quinn had only her best interests at heart. If Marie Quinn wanted her to be fat, well, then fat must be coming into fashion.

Rarity's mouth was full of candy when the bell over her door rang; she swallowed it quickly before trotting over to meet Marie Quinn, all too mindful of the way her stomach wobbled. Marie Quinn's mane had gotten taller in the past fortnight, and for a moment Rarity forgot her own worries and just wondered whether she could possibly pull that style off--such was the power of Marie Quinn.

"Good morning, Ms. Quinn," she said, doing her best to hide her nervousness.

"Good morning, Rarity," Marie Quinn replied, her expression stern. "Oh, dear."

At those two little words, Rarity's mind raced into overdrive. What was wrong? Was she too fat? Oh, she was too fat, wasn't she! Now she'd lose out on the modeling job and have to lose all this weight while depressed, and...

"--ly been two weeks, but I admit that I expected more from you, Rarity." The unicorn had been so caught up in her panic that she hadn't realized that Marie Quinn was still taking. As she parsed out the older pony's speech, her blue eyes went wide.

"You mean you want me to gain more weight?" she shrieked, rather louder than she had meant to. Marie Quinn just sniffed primly.

"Obviously, Rarity. This--" she patted the unicorn's stomach with one perfectly-manicured hoof. "--is not nearly sufficient for what I had in mind. Perhaps I was wrong to trust you to do this on your own..."
151111111.title: Pfft, That's Nothing!

choices: Rarity continues trying to gain by herself
Rarity goes to one of her friends for help
1511111111.content:
Rarity gulped. What in Equestria could that mean? It was bad enough having to gain weight; she shuddered at the thought of having someone else force her to do it. And that had sounded like a threat.

"N-no, Marie Quinn," she said hurriedly. "I guess I just haven't been trying very hard! I didn't know what you expected, so I decided to err on the side of caution!" That was a lie, of course. She'd gained as little weight as she thought would be acceptable, but damned if she was going to let Marie Quinn know that she was anything other than enthusiastic about the offer to become a model.

Marie Quinn's frown deepened a little. "In that case, Rarity, I think it would be wise to set some firm rules." She circled the unicorn with a critical expression that made Rarity quake inwardly. "You gained, what, 10 pounds in the last two weeks? I'm afraid that's not nearly good enough. In order for you to stay on track for this job, you're going to need to gain at least 40 in the next two, but from there we should be able to slow down a little."

Despite herself, Rarity let out a terrified little squeak. 40 pounds?! That was ludicrous! And the from there was unsettling as well. What had she gotten herself into?

Marie Quinn must have known what Rarity was thinking, because she sniffed and said, "Well, it wouldn't be so much if you'd done better. You just need to catch up." After another look at Rarity's horrified expression, she added, "Are you sure you wouldn't like some assistance?"

Rarity shook her head in what she hoped was a very decisive manner. "Oh, I think I'll be fine. As I said, I was simply unclear on what I was supposed to do. I doubt I'll have any difficulty now that I have a goal."

"Very good. But please understand, Rarity, that if you continue to disappoint me, I may not have a place for you in my upcoming campaign..."

"I understand," Rarity said, not quite able to meet Marie Quinn's eyes. "I promise I'll do better."

"Then I will see you in two weeks. Don't disappoint me."

As soon as Marie Quinn was out of the shop, Rarity collapsed dramatically into a chair. 40 pounds in two weeks!? That was unthinkable! Her own feelings about getting fat aside, she just failed to see how she could physically gain that much weight.

But she'd already come too far to give up now.
1511111111.title: Rarity Can Do It

choices: Twilight Sparkle, to get magic help
Pinky Pie, for just, y'know, food
15111111112.content:
As uncertain as she was that she's be able to do what Marie Quinn asked, Rarity knew that the longer she waited to get started, the more difficult it would be. So she heaved herself off her chair and emptied the various candy dishes around the workroom. They didn't fill her up, but she'd eaten quite a lot of their contents before Marie Quinn had gotten there.

Besides, just snacking on treats while she was working obviously wouldn't be sufficient any more. That had gotten her ten pounds over two weeks, but clearly she had to put more effort into gaining if she didn't want Marie Quinn to cancel her contract.

She sighed. She was quite good at following a plan when she needed to be--her daily beauty regimen was a testament to that. But she just didn't feel inspired to gain weight, and despite what she'd said to Marie Quinn, she wasn't sure that she could motivate herself.

Suddenly, a thought struck her: Maybe she could get one of her friends to help her! They had been...polite about her gain so far, and they hadn't even known why she was suddenly getting fat. Surely they would be supportive of her once they knew the excellent reason she had.

And besides, unlike whatever feeding regimen Marie Quinn had in mind, Rarity trusted her friends. And the added stress of having someone else invested in her progress would do wonders for her motivation!

Taking a deep breath, Rarity walked out of the boutique and went to go find...
15111111112.title: But Who to Ask?

choices: Pinkie throws a party for Rarity
Rarity gets out of the party
151111111122.content:
Although Rarity was hesitant to show her expanding waistline to any of her friends, Pinkie Pie seemed like the safest choice. For one thing, the poor dear didn't know anything about fashion, and Rarity strongly doubted that her friend payed attention to other ponies' bodies. For another, Pinkie was quite the baker, and if Rarity was going to gain the frankly absurd amount of weight Marie Quinn wanted her to, she'd need the best sweets available.

She took tiny, mincing steps on the way to Sugarcube Corner, trying to minimize the swing of her stomach. Thank goodness, she didn't run into anyone she knew well during her walk, but she still felt like everypony's eyes were on her--a feeling she normally enjoyed, but which now just made her uncomfortable. She was so anxious that when Pinkie Pie jumped at her the moment she entered the bakery, she screamed.

Pinkie just giggled. "I'm not a monster, silly!"

"Yes, well, you just startled me; that's all," Rarity replied, brushing herself off primly.

"What can I do ya for?" Pinkie asked, bounding around Rarity.

"Iwashopingyoucouldhelpmegainweight," the unicorn muttered as quickly and quietly as she could. Pinkie's ears stretched cartoonishly toward Rarity.

"Oh, are we playing the quiet game? I love the quiet game!" Pinkie said in the loudest whisper Rarity had ever heard. It was still fairly quiet for Pinkie, though, so Rarity decided to gallop with it.

"Uh, of course we are, darling!" Rarity whispered back, thinking fast. "And if you stay very, very quiet, I'll tell you about another, even more secret, game."

"Ooo--mmf!" Pinkie started to squeal, but clapped her own hooves over her mouth to stiffle the noise. Rarity nodded, with an rather pained smile, and Pinkie went back to her loud whisper. "Is the other game hornussen? Because I already know how to play that!" To Rarity's utter bafflement, the earth pony produced a placard on a long stick.

"What? Uh, no," Rarity said before taking a moment to collect herself. "The new game is to help me gain as much weight as possible."

"Pssh, why didn't you just say so right away?" Pinkie exclaimed, not put off in the slightest. "I bet I'm great at this game!"

"You mean you'll help me? Oh, thank you, darling, thank you so much!"

"Hmm," Pinkie said, tapping her chin with one hoof. Then her face lit up. "I know!" She paused for dramatic effect.

"What? What is it?" Rarity asked, eager to get this over with as soon as she could.

"It's..." Pinkie paused again. "...A party! That way, we can tell everybody so they can help out, all while having fun!"

Rarity groaned.
151111111122.title: Pinkie, Please?

choices: The rest of the Mane Six step in
1511111111221.content:
No matter what Rarity said to try and dissuade her friend, Pinkie was adamant about throwing a party that very evening. Eventually, she pushed Rarity out the door (with a take-home bag of baked goods) to set up, which meant that Rarity wasn’t even able to monitor her progress and make sure the party wasn’t getting out of hoof. If there was one positive thing about her nerves, though, it was that she was used to eating when anxious, so at least she made good use of the dozen cupcakes Pinkie sent home with her—and did it quickly enough that by the time she went back to Sugarcube Corner for the party, it was as if she hadn’t eaten all day.

When she arrived, Rarity pushed the bakery’s door open cautiously, unsure of what to expect. When she saw what was going on inside, she let out a breath she hadn’t realized she’d been holding. There was definitely a party happening in there, but it looked like a pretty normal one, without any indication that Pinkie had put it together with the intention of helping Rarity gain weight. When the white unicorn trotted inside, she thought she caught some of the guests staring at her, but she’d felt like that ever since she started gaining. It might well have been all in her head.

There was a lot of food laid out around the bakery, even for one of Pinkie’s parties, and the pink mare was particularly attentive about keeping Rarity’s plate full, but those things were both much subtler than Rarity had expected. As the evening went on and nothing crazy happened, she found herself relaxing and genuinely having fun, even as she continued to munch on the treats Pinkie plied her with. The party wound down to the point where only Rarity, Pinky, and their four closest friends remained.

Then, suddenly, she heard Pinkie whisper, "Psst! Rarity! C’mon up here!"

Pinkie wasn’t anywhere near her, though—that whisper had carried all the way across the room. The others stopped whatever else they were doing to look at Pinkie’s display of anti-subtlety even as Rarity shuffled over, avoiding her friends’ gazes.

"Okay, everybody!" Pinkie announced once Rarity was at her side. “You probably didn’t know, but this party has a secret purpose: Rarity wants to gain weight!” And she poked Rarity’s tummy, causing it to jiggle.

Rarity went stiff, positively mortified. Her mouth dropped open, and Pinkie took the opportunity to shove a brownie in. Rarity struggled to swallow the unexpected mouthful, then said, "Really, that’s not necessary. I, uh—"

And she was cut off as Pinkie fed her another brownie.

"Don’t be shy, Rarity!" the earth pony said brightly. "We’ve got a lot of treats left over for you! C’mon, guys, who wants to help out?"
1511111111221.title: Party Time!

15111111112212.content:
By the time Twilight, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, and Fluttershy got over their shock, Pinkie had stuffed Rarity with the whole plate of brownies, and had moved onto a tray of donuts. Rarity had already been eating more than she usually would at a party, and Pinkie hadn’t been kidding about there being a lot of food left. The white unicorn was deeply unsure of her ability to finish it all.

“W-wait, Pinkie!” Twilight cut in, levitating the next donut away before Pinkie could feed it to Rarity.

“Fantastic!” Pinkie trilled. “Here you go!”

She passed the tray of donuts to Twilight, who approached Rarity hesitantly. “Are you okay?” the purple unicorn whispered.

Rarity nodded. “Believe it or not,” she said, just as quietly, “Pinkie was telling the truth. I asked her to help me gain—so I suppose I should’ve expected something like this.”
