151111111122122.content:
Rarity awoke the next morning to the sound of somepony knocking at her front door. She groaned and rolled out of bed, noting when her hooves hit the floor that she felt heavier than she had just the previous day. And no wonder, she thought as the memories of the previous night’s feeding came rushing back to her.

She didn’t have time to dwell on it, though. She ran a brush through her mane and tail as quickly as was safe (brushing too quickly only led to split ends, after all) and hurried downstairs to answer the door, her belly swaying between her legs.

Rarity opened the door to the boutique to see Applejack standing there, a forehoof raised to knock again.

"Mornin’," the earth pony said with a cheerful smile.

"Oh, good morning," Rarity replied. "My apologies for the wait, I—"

"Slept in a li’l, did ya? Well, it’s no wonder, after last night. And on that note, I, uh, I brought you some breakfast." Applejack rubbed the back of her head uncomfortably as she moved aside to reveal the cartful of food she’d brought with her.

Rarity felt as awkward as Applejack looked, but she managed to say, “Why, thank you. That’s very kind. If you’d like to start bringing things in, I’ll be out in a moment to help you.”

As Applejack nodded and went to unload her cart, Rarity cleared off one of her worktables and quickly set it for a meal—two places, though she wasn’t sure if Applejack planned to eat with her. It was only polite. She couldn’t imagine Applejack expecting her to eat anything after the previous night’s stuffing. Even as the thought crossed her mind, though, she realized to her surprise that she was hungry, somehow. And that was just as well; by the time the two of them had fully unloaded the cart, the table was piled high.

Applejack helpfully slid a whole pie onto Rarity’s plate, then stood back, smiling. "Well, go on. Dig in!"

"Aren’t you going to join me?" Rarity said, even as she cut a thick slice of the pie. It was a bit uncouth to eat before one’s guest had been served, but the pie smelled amazing, and she was eager to dig in.

"Naw, Ah ate before Ah came over. This is all fer you. No need ta stand on ceremony on my account."

"That’s very kind of you, Applejack," Rarity managed to say before she couldn’t help it any longer and started to chow down on the pie. It tasted as good as it smelled, and before she knew it, she’d eaten the whole thing. She lifted a second one over to herself at the same time Applejack handed her a plate of fritters, but she just shrugged and alternated between the two treats. Her goal, if she wanted to gain enough weight for Marie Quinn, was to clear the table anyway, so order didn’t matter, particularly when everything was so delicious.

In fact, the unicorn managed to eat about two thirds of the assembled food before she had to pause to catch her breath.

"Ya know, ya didn’t tell us last night why ya want ta gain weight," Applejack said conversationally, though the look on her face suggested she’d been waiting for a break in the gorging to ask.

"Oh, I suppose I didn’t. Well, I have an opportunity to land a modeling job with a very influential designer, but this designer has some…unorthodox ideas about the ideal model figure."

"She wanted you ta get fat, ya mean."

“Yes,” Rarity agreed. "The amount she insisted I gain if I want the position is substantial, so I’m grateful for the help.”

She had a pretty good idea what Applejack thought of the fashion industry, so she half-expected the earth pony to be judgmental of gaining for a reason like that, but all Applejack said was, "Ah’m just happy ta see somepony enjoy mah cookin’ so much, no matter why ya want it. And on that note, would ya like any help finishin’ the rest of that?"

Rarity looked over the food still on the table. She was indeed beginning to feel quite full, despite her resolve to eat everything presented to her. Letting Applejack have some of it wouldn’t hurt the growth of her waistline too much, and it was the orange pony’s food to begin with, anyway.

"Of course! Go ahead," Rarity said. Applejack nodded, but instead of taking some of the food for herself, as the unicorn had anticipated, she took a slice of pie and stuffed it into Rarity’s mouth.

"Mmmph!" Rarity’s eyes widened with surprise.

"Are ya all right? Ah can be gentler."

Rarity was going to say that she hadn’t meant that she wanted Applejack to feed her, but she found her mouth already open and salivating a bit for the next bite. She closed it decorously and shook her head. "I’m perfectly fine. Please, proceed."

1511111111221221.content:
Over the next two weeks, at least one of Rarity’s friends showed up every day with food for her. Sometimes they’d stay and feed her, sometimes they had too much other work to do and she was left to her own devices, but she was grateful to each and every one of them for the help.

And that help had certainly paid off. Rarity’s stomach hung notably lower between her thicker legs and rump, and a double chin had fully formed under her plumpened face. If it wasn’t for her still-immaculately-groomed mane and tail, she would scarcely have been recognizable as the slender unicorn she’d been not so long ago. When she weighed herself the morning of Marie Quinn’s visit, she found to her relief that she’d gained 48 pounds, a little over what was required of her.

She was still nervous when Marie Quinn arrived and gave her a hard, appraising stare before even offering a greeting. But then the shorter unicorn smiled.

"You look good," Marie Quinn said, even as she continued to appraise Rarity’s expanded figure, occasionally prodding her newly-acquired flab. "This was much more what I had in mind when you said you’d be willing to put on weight for this campaign. How much have you gained in the past fortnight?"

"F-forty-eight pounds, Ms. Quinn," Rarity replied, trying not to squeal with joy. From a pony as businesslike as Marie Quinn, a simple you look good was lavish praise.

Marie Quinn nodded. "Good work. I think you’ll fit this campaign after all. I’ll have one of my assistants take your exact measurements, and then the shoot will commence in an hour or so. Here’s the address," she added as she floated over a slip of paper.

"Shoot? Forgive me, I thought this was for a runway show." Not that there was anything wrong with catalog modeling, but for all the effort she put in, Rarity felt she deserved to walk a runway.

"The runway show isn’t until next season. In the mean time, I’m doing a few print campaigns as a kind of preview. One doesn’t revolutionize the fashion industry overnight!"

"That makes sense, I suppose," Rarity said—although even if it hadn’t, she certainly wasn’t going to contradict Marie Quinn.

1512.content:
Celestia raises the sun over ponyville. A classical tune can be heard playing in the wee hours of the morning: the Sunrise Quartet. No one is awake to listen...
No one but a lone white unicorn.
Rarity had slept wonderfully the night before. With her business on the rise, she had to be very organized with her schedule. Only 6 hours of sleep, then up at sunrise to prepare her shop. Work for 10 hours, in bed by 9, and a good amount of socializing packed in. As she sat up stiffly in bed, she glanced at her flank, finally proud of the truth.
For years, Rarity had been known as the fashionista queen. Her dresses sold well, and her diamond pieces were exquisite. All was going well until she was sued for copyright infringement.
As it turned out, Rarity had lied to the world. She was not a designer - all of her designs had been stolen from other ponies. She had invented the story of the diamond cutie mark, and slightly altered her flank to her liking. Though she did have wonderful taste, her real talent lay in a different kind of taste:
A taste for chocolate.
Her cutie mark had originally been three diamond-shaped chocolates, but before anyone could see, she had dyed them blue. Now, however, she was proud of her talent, and had transformed the Carousel Boutique into the Chocolatier de La Ville du Cheval. She specialized in dark chocolates with rich fillings, and always gave free samples.
This morning, however, she found it a little difficult to get out of bed. She glanced down at her stomach. It had become a bit pudgier recently, but the other sweet specialists of Ponyville had assured her that a few extra pounds were to be expected in the candy business. It wouldn't be noticeable, they said. Rarity put a hoof to her tummy. It sank in just a little. Not noticeable, said the voices in her head.
"Of course, Rarity. Nothing shameful about a few extra pounds. Not noticeable at all," she thought aloud. It would just take some getting used to. She pushed herself up off her bed and put on her slippers. She would wait to freshen up before the shop opened.
Downstairs, Sweetie Belle was waiting with breakfast. She had gained her chocolate-selling cutie mark after selling a bag of caramels, and proudly sported a chocolate coin, but it hadn't improved her cooking skills in the slightest. Breakfast was a charred mess. However, Rarity was not discouraged.
"Oh darling, not this again. Come, I'll teach you to cook a proper breakfast," said Rarity. Sweetie Belle brushed off the insult and instead focused on learning to cook.
"What are we gonna cook, Rarity?' she asked.
"Well, we let's see, how much time before shop opens up..."
"Rarity, it's a Wednesday. We're not open on Wednesdays," said Sweetie Belle.
"Is it now? I could've sworn yesterday was Wednesday," said Rarity, glancing over at their calendar.
"Rarity, you've been really forgetful lately. Are you feeling okay?" asked Sweetie Belle.
"Of course I am, darling. I've never felt better. Now, let's get cooking, shall we?" said Rarity with a smile. Sweetie Belle grinned in return.
With nothing to do but cook, Rarity and Sweetie Belle spent most of the morning cooking every breakfast recipe they had. By lunch time, the kitchen was full with delicious meals and wonderful smells. Rarity had been much more patient with Sweetie Belle since she had revealed the truth, and the two had prepared an enormous feast.
"Well done, Sweetie Belle! You did an excellent job," said Rarity. Her eyes fell over countless dishes: eggs benedict, French toast, broccoli and cheese omelettes...
"What are we gonna do with all this food, Rarity?" asked Sweetie Belle.
Rarity's stomach growled. She hadn't had a bite to eat since the day before. "We're going to eat it, of course!" exclaimed Rarity.
"Eat it? You mean... all of it?" Sweetie Belle looked at the numerous plates. They covered all of the counters, tables, and windowsills. She had to push Opal out of the way to stop her from getting to them.
"Well, why not, darling? There's no work today, why not have a little extra fun?" and with that, she magically picked up a plate piled high with pancakes and stuck one in her mouth. As she chewed, she turned towards Sweetie Belle and gave a huge smile. Sweetie Belle smiled halfheartedly back at her, and followed suit.
Rarity sat in a chair, moving the plate of sunny-side up eggs on it out of the way. As she was about to place it on a counter, she thought better of it, and instead. took a few eggs off of the plate and onto her own. She gobbled them up happily, giving plenty to her sister, who wasn't nearly as hungry as Rarity. Suddenly, she got up, claiming that she had to help her friends get their cutie marks, and rushed out the door. Rarity was left alone with a truckload of food.
It didn't stand a chance.
She sat back in her cushioned armchair, her legs sprawled out. This was her time alone: just her and the food. Why not have a little snack? She savored each bite of each dish, chewed every bit thoughtfully. Her stomach swelled. It had never taken in that much food when she was in the dress business. As she continued eating, she leaned further and further back, accounting for the size of her rapidly growing belly. Most of the weight was going to her stomach, and it was showing. Rarity's chair was making strange noises, but she took no notice. She was too happy with the delicious flavors. She was so hungry. Why had she run away from the food business? This was glorious! She slipped out of her chair and onto the floor so that she wouldn't be so uncomfortable.
Chew, swallow, chew, swallow. Crispy waffles caramelized in syrup with soft, melted butter. Chew, swallow, chew, swallow. The size of her stomach was pushing apart her legs, and she lay on her back as she brought more food to her mouth. Chew, swallow, chew, swallow, chew, swallow. She had moved onto the sweeter treats now: Pinkie Pie's fantastic eclair recipe, drizzled with her own decadent chocolate sauce. It smeared all over her shiny white coat, but she didn't care. Chew, swallow, chew, swallow, chew, swallow, eat, eat, eat... all she could think about was how delicious each dish was. Her stomach was telling her she was full, but she didn't care. She didn't care about anything except these fluffy croissants with a savory marmalade. Chew, swallow, chew, swallow - stop.
She moved her hoof to the right, where she had been putting each dish. There wasn't one there. She sat up - or tried to. She suddenly noticed the size of her stomach. It was a great deal larger than this morning - about the size of a large filly. Her flank was larger too - the three chocolates had stretched, and each was bigger than her hoof. She tried pushing herself up, but to no avail. Gasping for breath, she tried to put her feet on the ground, but she couldn't even see her feet. Rarity began to panic. Finally accepting that her body was incapable of getting herself back up off the ground, she used her magic to levitate herself back on her feet. She surveyed the kitchen.
Plates were lying everywhere. Crumbs, forks, knives, everything - but all the food was gone. She had eaten every single meal.
She patted her stomach. It was immense, and she could barely stand on her feet, let alone walk. It really had all gone straight to her gut. That was when she noticed her heavy breathing. She felt at her neck. She must have had three chins. She looked at her hoof, and it was covered in chocolate, syrup, egg, and lots of other bits of meals. As she craned her neck to see her back, she saw that it was similar all over. She was coated in residue. She did the only thing she could think of, and began routinely cleaning up the kitchen. Washed a plate, place it in the cupboard. Wash, place, wash place...
About halfway through, Rarity noticed something strange. She couldn't put her hoof on it; she had been effectively cleaning, the plates were in the proper cupboard, what was it? She scratched her chin in confusion, and realized that she had a piece of chocolate in her mouth. She took it out, and looked down. As she had been washing she had been eating chocolate bars in a trance-like state. There were now a good many chocolate wrappers on the ground. Rarity spat out the chocolate and was about to throw it away, but thought better of it. What a waste to throw out such nice chocolate. She finished the chocolate and her cleaning as fast as she could, hoping that no one would stop by.

Fluttershy gave a contented sigh as she sat atop the hill-side, surrounded as usual by critters. She loved all wildlife, and often thought of the animals around Ponyville as friends just as other ponies were. And recently she had been happier than ever. Why? She was always surrounded by animals, it was true, but lately she had been able to connect even with the more ornery critters around. Badgers and stray cats, even Opalescence and Angel had been ready to cuddle up to her!

And that was the thing. Fluttershy had always enjoy cuddling, even if she was usually too frightened by other ponies to enjoy a hug. And recently, it seemed she had become more cuddly. It was no surprise, really. Getting closer to Pinkie Pie meant more sweets and parties, AJ loved to cook big family meals when she had guests over, and her other friends were all more active than her, even Rarity. So, in keeping up with her friends' diets, Fluttershy had found herself with rather a decent amount of fat on her frame.

At first, she had been concerned. What would Rarity think? Yet the dashing white unicorn still complimented Fluttershy from time to time on her appearances, the pegasus remembered with a blush. And her other friends? AJ was a stocky earth pony, Pinkie Pie had a certain amount of chub on her from her sweets, Twilight wasn't exactly fit... and Dash seemed to treat Fluttershy as off limits when it came to teasing. The speedster had been Fluttershy's personal protector growing up, after all. So her friends all seemed to not mind her rising weight. Still, Fluttershy realized she was at the tipping point, as it were. She looked at herself now, the way her pudgy round belly was squashed against the ground, rolling out from underneath her and giving an excellent pillow for the family of bunnies currently sleeping against her. She really was starting to enjoy this. And given how little she flied, it wouldn't really impact her life anytime soon. But she wasn't sure...

After all, Rainbow Dash always made it look easy to stay in shape, so perhaps she could help Fluttershy, if it came to that? Either way, Fluttershy figured her animal friends deserved the comfort, and set about giving them a little extra.

The obviously easiest way to gain some extra weight would be to follow the path of the heaviest mare in their circle of friends, Pinkie Pie. Pinkie was rotund, not fat outright but definitely on the heavy side. It didn't seem to ever slow her down, which now that Fluttershy thought about it was an encouraging sign. Once she was done tending to her animal friends she trotted into town, deciding to visit Sugarcube corner for lunch and get a start. She was rather surprised to find almost nopony else about. Wasn't the corner usually more busy this time of day?

"Fluttershy! Just the pony I was looking for! Well, kinda." Pinkie Pie greeted Fluttershy as the mare entered. The pink pony wore a huge grin on her face, and something made Fluttershy pause. Pinkie was sometimes a bit loud, and a bit scary, and something seemed to be up. She was looking for her? Why?

"H-Hello Pinkie Pie. Did you need help with something?"

"You guessed it!" Pinkie replied, rounding the counter. "I've been working all week to prepare for the Great Equestrian Bake-Off, and nopony seems to want to help me!" Pinkie complained.

"Bake... off...?" Fluttershy asked. Pinkie whipped out a flyer (from nowhere! Fluttershy knew better than to think too hard...) and showed Fluttershy what she meant. The flyer told of a giant cooking competition to be held in Canterlot, judged by the royal pony sisters themselves! Apparently it was the competitions' first year, but they were accepting all competitors and there was both a title and cash prize at stake.

"You need me...?"

"Yep! I asked my other friends but they were all like 'You'll ruin my figure, Pinkie!' and 'I already ate four cakes, Pinkie!' and 'Please don't eat me, Pin-' whoops, that one's from a different script."

"You mean you need me to taste test?" Fluttershy guessed. Wait, when had Pinkie taken the flyer out of her mouth? Where had it... oh, nevermind.

"Yep! Please please please, Fluttershy." Pinkie gave her wide, shimmering doe eyes, doing her best to look like a begging puppy. Fluttershy loved begging puppies. And besides, she hadn't exactly come in here for a light meal to begin with. Perhaps this would be a good way to start with her little, as Twilight would call it, 'experiment'.

"W-well, okay Pinkie."

"Great!" Pinkie rushed behind the counter, pulling out a decorated chocolate cake with berries stuck in the frosting. Fluttershy didn't exactly have much of a sweet tooth, but she did enjoy fresh fruit.

"Now you have to eat a whole slice, okay? That's the rules." Pinkie cut a piece off and pushed it towards Fluttershy, who trotted up to the counter. Taking a fork in hoof (who had designed these things?) she took a bare nibble. Ooh, that was pretty good. Then a second nibble. Despite how long it took the pegasus pony, Pinkie watched ecstaticly, never losing attention. Finally Fluttershy finished.

"That was... nice." She said sincerely.

"Nice?" Pinkie asked. Fluttershy nodded.

It was just after midnight that Gummy began to sense movement on the opposite side of the room - rubbing the sleep from his eyes and peering into the darkness groggily he managed to make out a silhouette working its way over to his large bowl. As the figure drew closer to the moonlight, Gummy could see that it belonged to a rather pudgy Fluttershy who appeared to be sleepwalking.

While Gummy knew that waking sleepwalkers was bad news, it was certainly awkward to have the pony looming above his bowl standing in place.
With her eyes closed, Fluttershy slowly lowered her head inside the bowl and began to delicately sniff at the water.
Without warning Fluttershy's tongue began to test the waters, lapping up Gummy's water into her mouth with vigor. It wasn't long before Gummy noticed that the original water level had decreased significantly, and more noticeably, Fluttershy's figure began to show the effects of her distended drink.
With each lap brought into her mouth, her stomach seemed to droop down an inch or so further to the ground until she had to sit down. With no signs of stopping Gummy retreated to the farthest end of his bowl in case he were sucked up too. As Fluttershy's tongue rubbed fruitlessly against the glass bottom, the young mare withdrew from the bowl with a delicate hiccup.
"Ooh...*hic*...Mmmm...", Fluttershy cooed in her sleep, subconsciously rubbing her stomach which now resembled a beach ball.
Struggling to rise to her feet, Fluttershy managed to lift her pendulous belly from the floor and slept walked over to the door leading back to the main hallway.
From Gummy's vantage point he could see her taut stomach shifting from side to side, struggling to deal with its watery payload with each step causing the water to swish and gurgle.
Passing through the door with moderate ease and only managing to get briefly stuck once, Fluttershy made her way down the steps towards the kitchen, her stomach brushing up against each step as the hiccuping pony descended.
Arriving in the kitchen, Fluttershy began sniffing at the smells of cookery that hung thick in the air, "Mmmm...*hic*..." the Pony lavished as she began to drool. Her stomach began growling as it was dragged across the floor, whether in pain or pleasure Fluttershy couldn't be sure.
As the scents in the air drew into her nostrils, she was aware that two distinct smells were splitting off in different directions; the smell to the left lead to a massive table with goods to go on sale the following morning at Sugarcube Corner, whereas the smell to the right lead to a fridge packed full with so many goodies it had been left slightly ajar.

"Thank you for helping me all day. Even though I went a teensy-eensy bit overboard." Pinkie shuffled her front hooves around, looking reluctantly guilty. Fluttershy put on her best smile. It was nice to be appreciated, and she hadn't really minded.

"It's okay, Pinkie Pie. It was nice."

Pinkie grinned, before suddenly leaning in and planning a close-lipped kiss on Fluttershy's cheek. Fluttershy stood stock still, unable to register the act. Pinkie leaned back, her grin now looking decidedly more coy.

"You're nice." Pinkie responded. Then with a giggle she held up a hoof. "See you tomorrow!"

Fluttershy realized that was her cue to leave, and with a very bright blush she turneda round and left. It wasn't until she was out of the shop that her brain even started getting into gear. Pinkie had kissed her! Now, some might take that as a simple, if over-enthusiastic, sign of close friendship. Except Fluttershy had already been down that road, years before. That had been how Rainbow Dash had shown her affection back in flight camp, once they were both a bit older. So Fluttershy had reason to believe that that had been a legitimate sign of affection.

What frightened Flutterhshy was that she wasn't really sure about how to feel about that. Her relationship with Dash had been short lived, but ended on good terms - they both got something out of being friends, but it turned out that a relationship just put too much pressure on them both. Since then, Fluttershy hadn't exactly had the courage to date anypony she didn't know. Stallions tended to scare her, as the only one who hadn't stared at her with obvious lust was Big Mac, who wasn't even interested in.... and she hadn't really thought about any of her mare friends before now.

Maybe... maybe tomorrow she'd go back, and see what happened. For now, the introspection had filled the time between Sugarcube and home. Still feeling the effects of her cake-filled belly, Fluttershy heaved herself inside and headed straight for bed. It was in her bedroom that she found Angel bunny waiting for her, looking a cross between upset and worried as he sat on her bed.

"Aww, Angel, I'm sorry I was out so long. Pinkie just needed help with some cakes, and..." Fluttershy stifled another burp as the digestion process set in. Angel glanced to his owner's suddenly rotund midsection, looking a bit perplexed. Fluttershy decided to clamber straight into bed, squeaking in surprise as her belly brushed against the fabric. With a little wiggling around she ended up comfortably on her back. Then Angel clambered up on her midsection. At first Fluttershy worried about the pressure, but once he settled it was really quite fine - she was stuffed to the brim, but the weight wasn't pulling her skin anymore and she had enough give that it didn't hurt. And from the looks of it, Angel had decided he approved of this, curling up ever-so-cutely on Fluttershy's belly. She smiled to herself. This might have been a good decision after all.

~~~~~~~~

The next morning, Fluttershy awoke content. She had slept soundly for once, not even awaking frightened at a bad dream or anything. Angel was apparently already up, as he was no longer on Fluttershy's belly. And speaking of belly, it seemed like the mare's had deflated over the night. Not by that much, and as she got up Fluttershy soon learned where it had all gone.

Already getting chubby, Fluttershy was now obviously overweight for anypony to see. Her belly was still quite pudgy, and she had puffier sides, just enough fat to round them out but nothing hanging yet. Her legs were thicker, as was her neck. Finally, her flanks had broadened some, sending a slight wobble across her as she walked. This was certainly more than she had expected to gain! Yet... Fluttershy definitely felt more cuddly. She was careful not to overfeed the animals yet couldn't deny she had always loved the squisher critters that gave her a hug, like baby bears or rolly-polly puppies. She just hoped her friends felt likewise.

Fluttershy would have to figure out what to do after breakfast, however. She was suprisingly hungry, and decided...

15221221.content:
Fluttershy tied a message to one of her carrier pigeons' feet, told it "Hello, Pigeon. If it isn't too much trouble, can you please get this to Applejack. Thank you." and sent it on its way. The message inside said that Fluttershy wanted Applejack to send over 30 bushels of apples. Fluttershy needed these apples partially to feed some of her many animals but mostly to feed her own immense hunger. Had she been a regular sized pony, she would simply have walked to Applejack's farm or market stall and purchased them, but her girth prevented her from walking because of the effort required to merely lift her giant body. Flying was also out of the question. She had never been that great of a flyer, but her recent weight gain had inspired other pegasi to adapt their mocking rhyme to "Buttershy, Buttershy, wants another piece of pie." Oh, how she had cried after trying to create a water tornado for Pegasopolis. Especially hurtful was the way Derpy had called her a "Muffin Vacuum" and joined in the taunting.

         Because of this, and the compassion of her friends, she mostly sent out notes to her friends asking for their help and they hadn't failed her yet. Surely enough, after about an hour, Fluttershy's pigeon returned with an invoice and following right behind was a cart full of apples being towed by Big Macintosh. Fluttershy waddled to the door and opened it. She stopped eating the last of the shipment of apple pies AJ had sent her a week ago and gathered the necessary bits from her purse.

         Big Macintosh looked at the huge yellow pegasus digging through a purse for his payment. Not since he had been given a love-potion or perhaps since he had been enchanted to love Smarty Pants had he felt such attraction for anything. He knew that no one had charmed him since he had traveled without stopping and had not talked to anyone in the past day. The way her fluffy cheeks and doughy stomach poked out delighted him to the extreme. As he was staring at her, she tried to walk out to hand him his payment and collect her apples, but something was wrong. Fluttershy was stuck halfway through her door, her gelatinous sides and underhanging belly blocking her from moving any further. She struggled and twisted her front trying to squeeze throught, but her fat flanks kept her from moving. "SOMEPONY HELP ME! I'M STUCK" yelled Fluttershy. Big Macintosh let down his apple cart and immediately ran off to try and pull Fluttershy from the doorway, but after a few paces, he paused.

         "Wait a minute," Big Mac thought. "If I leave her in there, I could feed her apples until she bursts. No, that's horrible. I must pull her out. It's the right thing to do." Big Mac looked at Fluttershy helplessly wiggling her hooves in an attempt to move forward, then looked at his full cart of apples. He looked back at Fluttershy's blushing, sweaty face and then back at his cart.

What should Big Macintosh do next?

Fluttershy swallowed her fears with that thought, remembering how big everypony else was as well.

Thanks to the town's many bakeries, particularly Sugarcube Corner, most local ponies have a hard time keeping fit. Soon after Twilight arrived a few months ago, she did a survey which showed the town's weight was almost twice the national average! Of course, with all the home-cooked meals and fresh air, the town didn't suffer as much from the negative effects of obesity as she expected, so she left it alone.

She swung open her cottage door to reveal an extra-large carriage shaped like an apple parked on the path. Her friends were already climbing aboard, and she couldn't help but feel better about herself as she watched their plump forms.

Twilight had, at first, been reluctant to embrace the Ponyville lifestyle, but already her resolve was crumbling beneath a constant barrage of Pinkie's sweets and Applejack's hospitality, as evidenced by her body's slight adipose layer.

Applejack was almost as big as Fluttershy, her size mitigated only by her active lifestyle. Her applebucking thighs were as round as the trees she bucked, and the belly swinging beneath her only seemed to add momentum to every kick.

Rarity's dress emphasized her curvy figure, particularly her plump, ladylike rump, in a way that would drive any stallion wild... And judging from the two pulling the carriage, it was working. Rarity had made sure to select the strongest specimens she could find, capable of pulling several mares as well as their own large forms, and Fluttershy couldn't help but blush as she saw some muscle flex beneath their pudgy legs.

Rainbow Dash was still built for speed, but through a combination of laziness and too much candy, she had grown a round little gut that pressed visibly against the fabric of her dress.

Lastly, Pinkie Pie. Her constant consumption of sugary sweets had taken a toll on her figure, yes, but not as badly as one might expect. In fact, she was the third smallest pony in town, next to Rainbow Dash and Twilight... Which admittedly wasn't saying much, considering the large gap between their sizes. Pinkie's backside was huge, round as medicine balls and never seemed to stop jiggling. Not that Fluttershy was complaining, as she watched her climb into the carriage.

"Fluttershy? Do you need any help getting in?" Twilight asked.

Fluttershy blushed, realizing how long she had been standing. "Eep!" She squeaked, before scrambling up the steps and onto her seat, which caused the entire carriage to rock violently.

Fluttershy sighed to herself as she awoke peacefully to the sound of birdsong. The birds always loved to wake her gently when morning came. Fluttershy opened her eyes, seeing the sun coming up over Canterlot, off in the distance. It wasn't that her bedroom had a great view or anything. Well, it did, but Fluttershy hadn't seen it in months. She hadn't seen inside any room in quite some time. It was really rather difficult to when you had a belly as big as a 1-story house.

Yes, Fluttershy was currently resting on her belly, a giant mound of fat that spread out several feet in every direction, keeping her so far off the ground that her comparatively stubby hooves had no chance of ever meeting earth again. Her multitude of chins led directly into the fat of the front of her body, all signs of a neck having long since disappeared. In fact, aside from the ends of her hooves peaking through her rolls, and two tiny wings attached her her back, the only defining body feature Fluttershy had left was a massive rear end, great rippled flanks that arched away from her, nearly swallowing her tail. Each cheek easily weighed more than Big Macintosh. Fluttershy took a deep breath and sunk further into her fat for a moment, causing more folds to appear around her head.

It had started when she was young. Pegasus ponies just weren't meant to stay on the ground. Between the lack of exercise she was getting and the heavy earth-pony food, Fluttershy had quickly developed into a pudgy filly. But that had only made her friends! Rainbow Dash, already her friend, seemed to like relaxing with her more, and as young Fluttershy bulked up her belly just became a good pillow for the lazy Rainbow. Her developing love of earth pony food was how she had met Pinkie Pie, who had to be solely responsible for a couple hundred pounds as she eagerly gifted away all the cakes, pies, and sweets that she could afford. And as she became increasingly inactive, she became a better listener, ideal for Rarity, who often seemed of two minds about Fluttershy's weight but had never bothered her.

It wasn't just ponies, either. Her animal friends loved to hide under her folds when it got cold, or rest on her when tired, and the more of her there was the more animals she could accomodate. By the time she started hitting immobility, her good friend Applejack would gladly cart her around, eager to help the mare responsible for about half their annual sales. Fluttershy had thought near-immobility had been the limit, until Twilight had shown up. Able to teleport Fluttershy in times of need, and otherwise magically able to remedy many of her issues with immobility, Twilight had helped Fluttershy expand to her current state. Every so often they moved her about for a change of scenery, helped her with necessities, as did the animals who brought her food from the forest and town.

Fluttershy wasn't just content because this was another peaceful day, however. Today was going to be a special day, today was....

Fluttershy did her daily exercise, at least, what felt like exercise. She accomplished the gargantuan task of rolling herself upright so she could see ponies as they approached her home. Just as she finished panting from her efforts, and after a few apples to help regain her energy, she saw a purple unicorn walking towards her. Fluttershy squeaked in delight and waved her flabby hoof as Twilight Sparkle approached her.

"Hello, Twilight. Did you read the spells you needed?"

"I sure did, Fluttershy. It's all in here," said Twilight as she lifted an old spellbook entitled "Healthful Hexes for Heavy Horses".

"Good," sighed Fluttershy, "I miss being able to walk."

"Well, if everything works out right, you'll be up and walking in no time," replied Twilight.

Fluttershy began to cry tears of joy for the ability to walk that she had lost quite some time ago. Twilight looked dutifully through her book and found the spell named "Adipostulate". Focusing her mind on the spell, a beam of purple energy shot from Twilight's horn to Fluttershy's body. "Oh my," gasped Fluttershy as the tingling sensation of the spell tickled her mounds of pudge. Twilight had to grit her teeth to keep the spell from dissolving at once. After about 30 seconds of intense effort, Twilight let her horn relax and the purple energy field around Fluttershy disappeared soon thereafter.

"Di- did it work? Am I thin again?" asked Fluttershy, who kept her eyes closed in anticipation of seeing her thin body once more.

"Uhh, well..." said Twilight. "You might want to open your eyes."

Fluttershy opened her eyes and looked down at her body, which was exactly the same size it had been before. Fluttershy started sobbing even harder, realizing she would forever remain immobile. "Hey, come on, Fluttershy. There's no need for tears." said Twilight, reassuringly.

"I know. It's just... it's just that I... I wanted to be able to walk again and do the things I used to." heaved Fluttershy between huge sobs that shook her fat rolls like an earthquake.

"I don't understand. I did everything the book said to do. This spell must have been translated incorrectly from Old Equestrian." explained Twilight as she looked diligently at the spell. Fluttershy continued to sob as she removed a cake from her fat rolls, which acted as a pantry for her enormous appetite. Just after Fluttershy had finished her cake, and a couple of Applejack's apple fritters as a post-dessert dessert, Twilight said, "Yep. That's it. That's definitely what went wrong."

"What is? What went wrong?" asked Fluttershy.

"It turns out there was an error in the translation of the spell's effects. This spell doesn't make you lose weight, this spell makes you GAIN weight!" said Twilight.

Today was her spa day! Oh, how wonderful. Fluttershy had long loved the spa, ever since Rarity had introduced her to it, as it had helped her often badly-stretched skin and aching joints. Even though that latter of those problems hadn't occured for months, she still very much enjoyed the time together. At first, when she had become immobile Fluttershy had assumed it would be the end of her time at the spa, but not quite so. No, the spa ponies Aloe and Lotus were more than happy to help their biggest customer - Fluttershy literally required many of their spa anemities by the bulk. Thank goodness Fluttershy received such a sizable stipend from the mayor's office for keeping the animals clear of farmland. It was a farming town after all, her services were vital.

The problem was simply getting there, and again, Twilight had proved immeasurably helpful. She was such a nice pony, Fluttershy was glad to be her friend. In fact, there she was now! They'd need to get an early start after all. Up towards the cottage Fluttershy was situated outside of trudged a certain pudgy purple unicorn. Oh yes, like Fluttershy, Twilight had never encountered good old earth pony food before, and that coupled with the fact that being friends with Pinkie Pie pretty much automatically added 15 pounds meant that Twilight was already looking a little rounder than when she had arrived. Just a little sway in her belly and wobble underneath her chin. Fluttershy had never given it much thought, but she'd have to say it looked good on Twilight.

"Good morning Twilight." Fluttershy smiled, earning a wave back from Twilight. She saw the mare huff, no doubt tuckered out from her long walk over. Fluttershy remembered those feelings. Her belly may have kept her off the ground, but not too much, and she only had to look down a little to talk to Twilight. It was enough to add a ninth chin though.

"Good morning Fluttershy. Ready to head to the spa?" Twilight asked. Fluttershy tried to nod, essentially just bobbing her head around in her fat. Twilight gave a good-natured chuckle.

"I just need to check to see if you've gotten any bigger before we start." Twilight replied, trotting around to Fluttershy's side.

"Thank you ever so much for helping." Fluttershy replied, her forelegs wiggling as she subconsciously tried to bring them together in a gesture of thanks.

"Don't mention it." Twilight replied. Fluttershy could barely believe how lucky she was; Twilight was always so eager to help out, and never asked for anything in return. Before they started, however, Twilight needed to know how much pony she was transporting. So Fluttershy was expecting the soft prod of Twilight's hooves in her doughy sides. She wasn't sure how Twilight was "measuring" her, but didn't know how magic worked. She had asked once, when Twilight had been so gingerly kneading her fat, and Twilight had thrown out a few big words that had stun-locked Fluttershy's brain. She had to admit, the touch of another pony was something she craved from time to time, there was something about it that differed from the animals clambering around her. It was why she so enjoyed when Dash used her as a pillow.

She heard a little grunt from Twilight, and tried to look back over her mounds of fat to see if everything was alright. She assumed Twilight was just a little tired. Then, with a squeak, Fluttershy felt a hoof on her flank. That... that was a little unusual. Twilight's hoof must have just strayed accidentally. There was a lot of flank to accidentally touch, of course.

Fluttershy allowed herself to be prodded and kneaded, trying to stop herself from breaking out in a blush. She didn't understand why she was blushing, but the careful, gentle touch of Twilight's hooves nearly made her quiver. When Twilight came back around, Fluttershy could see the other mare's face was flush as well. Perhaps it was just the weather.

"Okay. Hold still." Twilight said, as if Fluttershy could do anything else. Twilight's horn started to glow, and with a flash Fluttershy briefly felt weightless. The sensation instantly disappeared, and she blinked as she found herself looking at the walls of the spa. Okay, so technically she was indoors here, but it was less of a room here, the spa mostly one big open space.

"Ahh, Mizz Fluttershy, right ontime!" The accented voice of one of the spa ponies greated Fluttershy. Aloe, the blue mare, smiled as she greeted Fluttershy.

"We should get started before Mizz Rarity gets here, no? Why don't we start with..."

Spike licked his lips right before he shoved another ruby into his waiting maw. He chewed and swallowed, patting his distended tummy.

"Spike!" Twilight said from behind him. Spike was startled and choked on his snack, hacking the shards up onto the library floor. The purple mare gave Spike a look as he turned to face his dear friend and he smiled sheepishly. "What did I say about eating those gems?"

Spike huffed and crossed his arms, a feat that had become rather difficult for him. "Aw, come on Twi. You have no idea how good these are."

Twilight brought a hoof to her face. "Spike, I know this isn't easy for you, but last thing you need is more weight."

Spike sighed and looked at himself. He knew she was right, he just didn't want to admit it. Once upon a time he had merely been slightly chubby, probably due to baby fat or some such anomaly. Now his stomach extended quite far in front of himself and, due to dragons having an odd anatomy, a pile of fat between his legs forced him to waddle. His chunky knees could no longer touch each other and his flabby arms were getting harder to move, as well as his tale. His face had a small layer of pudge that made it look like he was keeping something in his cheeks. No doubt about it, he was fat. Not getting fat, fat.

Spike pat his large tummy and sighed. "I'm sorry, Twilight. It's just... this stunted growth thing is getting to me."

Twilight sighed sadly. She felt really bad about it and wished she could figure out what to do about it. Ever since Spike's greed induced rampage, it had basically been decided on that the young dragon would be stuck as a baby unless he gave in to his dragon nature. It had been hard for him to accept that he would be small for life and had turned to gems to ease the pain. Somehow through a reason Twilight had yet to discover, Spike's appetite and fat intake had increased greatly. She suspected it had to do with hoarding things, but that weren't any books on dragon training. She didn't even know of the excess fat was bad for Spike or not.

"Just... Please spike, cut back on the jewels. Any fatter and you will fall through the floor."

Spike wanted to make a snappy comeback but words failed him. He awkwardly stepped over to a chair and sat down with a heave. "I know, I know... just let me finish this bowl." He quickly stuffed a bunch more rubies in his mouth and swallowed. His stomach rumbled happily, but still hungered.

"Where are you getting all these anyway?" Twilight asked.

Spike opened his mouth to answer...
15312.title: A Young Growing Dragon

153122.content:
"Well..." he blushed. "Somepony's been giving them to me."

Twilight blanked at that. "Somepony has been giving you all these. No wonder you're so..." Twilight bit her lip.

Spike sighed. "Just say it."

"No, I can't, that would be rude."

"Twilight, look at me." Spike slapped his gut for emphases. It sloshed and jiggled from the force. "I'm nothing but that. We'll both feel better if you just come out and say it."

Twilight looked a bit unsure, but gave in. "Alright, yes Spike, you are fat. You're obese. You're a butter ball, you're jiggly jello, you're a pile of blubber and many other phrases of terms that mean 'you are fat.'"

Spike blinked. "Well... feel better?"

Twilight blushed. "A little..."

Spike noticed his now empty bowl of jewels. "Aww, all out of rubies... oh, shoot, what time is it?" Spike quickly (relative to his large shape) got out of his chair.

"About half past ten," Twilight said. "Why?"

"I promised I'd meet them ten minutes ago. I totally lost track of time." While lost in food Spike thought a little bitterly. He hadn't just been munching on his moderate stash of gems all day, anyway.

"Them who?" Twilight asked warily.

Spike blushed. "Uh... the one giving me the gems." Spike said. "And other snacks..." he added under his breath. "Anyway, I gotta get going. Bye, Twi, I'll be back latter!" Spike lumbered through the door of the library.

Twilight considered stopping him, but decided against it. He was in a miserable position, after all. Surely one day with whoever was feeding him couldn't hurt too much, right?

Right?

"Just don't overeat!" Twilight called after him. Spike didn't respond if he heard and she merely watched him waddle away. He is kind of cute, she thought with a smile as she turned back in.

Spike smiled to himself as he walked along the cobbled streets of Ponyville, earning a few stares from ponies walking by. He tried to ignore them as he made his way too...
153122.title: He's beeing well fed, at least.

1531221.content:
Spike huffed and puffed as his brisk jog slowed to a lumbering waddle. Despite this he felt accomplished. He had made the whole three blocks of the jog in a fair amount of time. He stopped in front of the Boutique to catch his breath, falling on his rump. He winced as he realized there was hardly any 'fall' in the falling.

"Okay..." he puffed after moment. "Just go in there (huff) chat and maybe help out a bit and (huff) don't eat anything... or too much." Spike struggled back to his feet and stepped up to the door, noting with some annoyance that his stomach touched the wood before his arm could get anywhere close. He turned sideways and rapped with his chubby fingers.

The door opened and Spike smiled. "Hi, Sorry I'm late..."

15312212.content:
"Spike!" Sweetie Belle shouted as she clapped her fore hooves. "You made It! I was worried you weren't coming to help me with my art project."

Spike fanned himself, hoping he wasn't really sweaty. "Don't worry, when Spike makes a promise he keeps it. So, uh... what are we doing again?"

Sweetie motioned for Spike to come inside, to which he waddled in and was glad that it was a double door he walked through. He could just fit through most other doors in town, and that was probably going to change soon. "This time I need help sorting the jewels. You and Rarity are the only ponies- uh, pony and dragon- that can tell what are the best ones. And my project has to have the best of the best."

Spike nodded as best as he could. His thick chin and the new one forming made it a bit difficult. "And what exactly is this project?"

Sweetie smiled as her eyes darted left and right as they walked into one of the back rooms. "Oh, uh, you know... school stuff. It's gotta be pretty. Yeah. Pretty."

Spike had stopped listening. His mouth salivated somewhat and his eyes became shiny. There were enough gems in front of him to keep him full for a week! Well, maybe a few days... or just two... at least until dinner.

"So, go ahead and pick out the really good ones and you can have the rest. If there's enough of the good stuff you can have any extra." Sweetie shoved over a chest obviously meant to hold the high quality stones. "I'll be in the kitchen getting us a snack. Holler if you need anything."

Spike licked his lips as he approached the pile with arms poised to attack, then slapped his chubby cheek. "Whoa, Spike, calm down. You need to watch your weight, just look at you!" He looked back at his large rear end. "Sure, it's not your fault that your growth is stunted and this is probably some weird side effect, but you shouldn't make it worse!" His stomach gurgled at him. "Then again, I'm gonna end up huge anyway. Maybe I should just- no! I'm not gonna let myself go! But... I might as well not fight it. I'll sort these and claim my prize." With a defeated sigh, Spike sat on his rump and again flinched when it barely took any time to hit the ground. He grabbed a handful and began to inspect each one, being sure to toss the good ones into the chest and the crunching the other ones. Much to his chagrin, as the pile shrunk, he could see himself grow. He could actually feel himself getting fatter with every swallow. Maybe he was imagining it, but he could swear that his arms felt a bit heavier with every reach.


With one last crunch he was done. Towards the end he had to roll onto his stomach to reach the last of them. He groaned as his body gurgled and rumbled from his feast. It wasn't a pained groan though, as he was actually still hungry. No, he groaned because of what a pig he made of himself. As he rocked himself back and forth to get back on his legs, he wondered how long it would take before he couldn't walk anymore. He envisioned himself having to be rolled everywhere.

He felt a pang of guilt when he realized that didn't sound so bad.

"Wow, finished already?" Sweetie asked as she carried a platter of food on her back. She looked into the chest to see it was half full with jewels. "And there's so many here. I don't think I need that many."

Spike suppressed a moan, or maybe it was a cheer. That meant more high quality, extra fattening gems for him.

Sweetie nuzzled Spike's belly. "Thanks for all the help, Spike. And here's a reward for you." She placed the platter on a coffee table. "I made us lunch. Some hayseed sandwiches, an apple pie, some cup cakes, a few of those fancy chocolate bread thingies Rarity likes."

Oh boy, more food, Spike thought. He wasn't sure whether he meant that in an apprehensive way or not. "You made all that just now? I was only here for... how long have I been doing this?"

"About an hour," Sweetie said before blushing. "Uh, well, I bought the pie from Applejack, but I did make this other stuff." She grinned sheepishly. "For you," she added softly.

Spike looked at the assortment of goodies and picked up a cupcake. "I'm certainly not one to pass a free meal." Spike gulped the desert down in one bite. "Mmm... so good."

Sweetie smiled. "I'm so glad you liked it. Have as much as you want!"

Spike opened his mouth to say something, but let out a large burp instead. He blushed, but Sweetie Belle giggled. "You know, I learned from Pinkie that in some parts of the world that burping is a compliment."

With a chuckle, Spike grabbed another cupcake. "Well, in that case..." Just like the first, he ate it in one bite. He opened wide and belched as loud as he could, making Sweetie laugh harder.

"I must be getting good then," Sweetie said after her fit, by which time Spike had eaten more food. Sweetie merely smiled at the sight.
15312212.title: "Sweetie Belle"

choices: Sweetie looked pleased with this development.
153122122.content:
Spike massaged his belly as the last bit of food went down his throat. For the first time in a while he felt full and satisfied. He had forgotten how nice it was. "Wow, am I stuffed," he said looking up at his globular gut. He wasn't sure when or why, but at some point in his binge he had gotten onto his back. To his chagrin, he found that his body rose like a mountain. He certainly felt like one.

Sweetie jumped onto his stomach and forced a burp out of him. "I guess that means no seconds, then."

"I don't (urp) don't think so," Spike said in a bit of a haze. He smiled up at Sweetie. "If I didn't know better, I'd think you were trying to fatten me up."

Sweetie blushed and opened her mouth, but was interrupted as Spike's body rumbled. "Whoa!" she yelled as she instinctively held on tighter. Spike moaned as he felt an odd pressure in his belly- not just there, but his whole being. He belched louder than he ever had and closed his eyes from the discomfort of whatever it was pushing out. He opened his eyes to see if he was okay, but his mind froze from what he saw.

Spike watched in awe as he grew. This wasn't like when he became an adult dragon and grew in massive spurts. This was gentler and a bit more subtle. He was watching himself grow fatter. To his horror, he watched as the peak of his belly where Sweetie Belle was hanging on rise higher and higher. He felt his arms get heavier over his torso as he felt that get laden with fat as well. He felt his head being pushed back by what he hoped was only a second chin getting thicker. He even experienced the bizarre sensation of being lifted as his rear and even his back piled with blubber and pushed his up. Spike couldn't see it, but he felt the scales on his tail stretch to accommodate the new ponds.

Then he came to a sudden stop. His form jiggled from the sudden growth and he laid there flabbergasted staring at the mountain that was now him. He must have gained at least a hundred pounds. Spike's body finally stopped sloshing, but his mind was running rampant.

What the hay!? I'm huge! How did this happen? Am I sick? What will everpony think? Am I contagious? What if I keep growing, what if I destroy the town!? He felt like he was going to faint. At last he looked up to see what Sweetie Belle could be thinking about this incredibly awkward situation...
153122122.title: Sudden growth!

1531221222.content:
"Oh no!" Sweetie shouted while trying to get a good footing on Spike's flab. "Spike, are you okay?"

Spike felt himself jiggle as she moved on top of his stomach. He opened his mouth to speak but his newly fattened lips and cheeks didn't work like they did before, and all that came out was, "Harmmph ermmff foogh."

Sweetie panicked. "Oh jeez, I broke Spike! Twilight's gonna kill me! Zecora's gonna have me for dinner!" She jumped down and tried to push spike into a sitting position. "Hrk, you've gotta weigh a ton now."

The part of Spike's brain that had been cultivated by Twilight guessed he was near the five hundred pound range, and large amount of mass for his tiny form. Well, his once tiny form. "Wazza meen?" he said.

Sweetie leaped way with a gasp. "Oh my gosh, you can still talk. Spike, tell me I didn't break you or hurt you." She went up to Spike's face and grabbed his cheeks in her hooves. "I couldn't live with my self if I hurt you."

Spike smacked his lips in an attempt to fell how his mouth now worked. "Howzit your fault?" He mumbled. He tried to shake himself forward but it was no use. He was too heavy and his muscles to weak to move of his own will. He found he could still move his thicker flabby arms with relative ease which was some relief.

Sweetie looked ready to cry as she squeezed Spike's flabby head. "I'm so sorry! I was jealous of how Rarity had somepony like you that liked her and I was trying to get you to like me, so I've been giving you lots of snacks to make you happy! And then I thought if I could make it really tasty you'd be all mine. I stole some potion from Zecora that was supposed to make my food so good you wouldn't be able to say no to me, but all I did was make you fat!" She sobbed a bit and and buried her head into Spike's bloated jowls.

Spike felts his scales get wet as she cried on him. She really was fattening me up, Spike thought a bit ruefully. He was getting fat because of her. Sure he was getting fat all on his own, but Sweetie sped up the process. And now he'd reached immobility way before he thought would.

He sighed. He was going to get here anyway, he realized. He would have become this blob at some point. She wasn't trying to do this to him, she just had a crush that led to a pretty big problem. It was kind of awesome to have somepony doing stuff for him instead.

He sighed and put an arm around Sweetie Belle. "It's not your fault. At least, not that much."

Sweetie sniffed and looked at him. "So you're not mad?"

Spike sighed. "Naw, getting mad's too tiring." They both had a light hearted giggle at that.

"I'm so sorry. I just wanted you to like me."

Spike burped. "Well..."

1542.content:
Celestia gazed at the feast before her with a simple and cheeky little smile on her face. Her crown and regalia were somewhere in her room, thrown to the side as if she didn't care, which she no longer did. For a powerful realization had struck her right as she sat down for supper. She could pinpoint the exact moment it happened, too. It was just as a servant asked the all important question that set of what Celestia considered to be a wonderful life in her mind.

"Will you have soup or salad, Princess?"

And her eyes went wide when the thought finally occurred to her. Why had she never realized it before? She blamed it on the fact she had to plan for her sisters return from being stuck on her moon, but that time had passed. At last, she could see the amazing truth before her.

She was a princess.

Well, of course she was a princess, it was her title. But it suddenly hit her what that actually meant. She could ultimately do whatever she wanted, within reason, and nopony could stop her.

"All of it," Celestia replied.

The servant blinked. "All of it?" she asked.

"All of it?" Celestia's sister, Luna, asked from next to her.

"All of it," Celestia confirmed. "Except for whatever Luna wants. Just bring we the whole lot of it."

"Just a bowl of soup, thank you," Luna had said tentatively, to which the servant bowed and walked away.

"Splendid," Celestia said. "I'm so hungry I could eat the moon."

Luna narrowed her eyes. "Why the sudden hunger, dear sister? You always get salad."

Celestia chuckled gently. "Well, is there a problem if I eat more?"

Luna raised a brow.

Celestia secretly shivered in anticipation. For the longest time she and deprived herself of tasty treat and glorious meals in an attempt to keep her image. But what did that honestly matter? Even if she became a blob, she'd still be the one who raised the sun and she'd still have all the power. Ponies would still have to listen to her.

The consumption of the massive pot of broccoli soup and a massive salad bowl topped with the fancy dressing she usually save for special led to her, politely of course, asking for more food. That led to the spread in front of her. Crammed until just about spilling, the table was filled with a ten course meal that would make a normal pony full just from looking at it.

Or it was, until Celestia had a snack.

Luna's mouth hung open as she watched the last of the pasta be slurped into Celestia's mouth. Celestia patted her brand new paunch and gave a dainty burp. Luna wasn't sure if she was impressed of mortified. "Celestia... you do realize you just ate enough to feed a small family for a couple of days, do you not?"

"Isn't it grand?" Celestia nodded. "It feels wonderful to indulge oneself. Oh, I'm sorry, did you want some?"

"No I do not. Honestly, this is not normal behavior for you. What has gotten into you?"

"Besides that wonderful garlic bread?" Celestia asked as she stared sadly at the empty bowl she had been lifting with her magic. "I guess I just realized today that it doesn't really matter. I mean, really, who's going to stop me?"

The servants cleared the dishes and replaced them just as quickly with many different flavors of ice cream. Celestia magically lifted a spoon and licked her lips. "Ooh, at long last. Triple chocolate fudge brownie, you shall be mine." She dug in and smiled as she smeared cool brown sludge on her pristine coat.

Luna sighed. "I'm worried is all. You look like you've already put on about twenty pounds."

Celestia liked the bowling until it sparkled and grabbed another. "Again I ask; what does it matter? we're immortal goddesses. A few extra pounds certainly isn't going to hurt me." Or maybe a few hundred, she thought. She didn't particularly care how much she gained as long as she got have more of this raspberry truffle flavor.

Luna looked contemplative for a moment.
1542.title: Realization and Dinner

15422.content:
Celestia stuck her tongue into the tub as far as her snout would let her reach. Those last few drops of vanilla would be hers if it was the last thing she did.

Luna herself had actually decided to indulge as well, though nowhere near the level of Celestia. She was tenderly working her own mint flavored ice cream and watching Celestia feast on more dairy treats. The darker alicorn smiled to herself as Celestia gave a little cheer when she got the last licks from the tub. She flung it aside and instinctively reached out for another tub with her hooves.

Celestia grunted when she realized she couldn't reach. Something was blocking her from the food! Why did the table suddenly seem so close but so far? She looked down to see what the problem was and paused. Her rounded and stuffed belly had grown large enough to keep the rest of her away. She looked and saw that her haunches had grown quite a bit as well. In fact, all over she had gained a soft layer of fluffy fat. She felt her face in astonishment.

"How much did I eat?"

Her stomach growled an a another tub of ice cream floated up to her. She smiled at her own foolishness at forgetting she had magic. But then she realized that she wasn't the one lifting it.

"To say you've eaten a feast would be an understatement, sister," Luna said. Celestia turned to see the soft glow of Luna's horn. "But somehow I get the feeling you are still hungry."

Celestia blushed and nodded and Luna brought the tub to her sister. Celestia greedily swallowed more creamy goodness.

"I have to say, you seem very chipper all of a sudden. Your demeanor is much happier... if not a noticeably thicker. Does this extreme gorging truly bring you joy?"

Celestia sighed and belched, giggled drunkenly as she massaged her bulging stomach. "I'm not going to lie; I love food, my dear Luna. I just want to eat and eat and never stop. And then I have to admit... all this pudge isn't so bad. Actually it's quite comfy."

"Pudge!?" Luna blurted. "You're fat and you know it!" She gave Celestia's flank a playful poke. To her surprise her hoof sank in quite deep. Celestia smiled.

"Well, if I have to be truthful, then yes I am indeed fat. Maybe i should stop for the- oh my." Celestia's face become even redder as Luna leaned into her sister's belly.

"You are quite comfy, actually." Luna hugged Celestia's newly sized body, to which Celestia happily returned. Luna pushed herself up and the two shared a laugh together.

"If this really does make you happy then I shall be faithful one hundred percent and help you eat to your hearts content."

Celestia beamed. "Really? You don't mind?"

Luna shrugged. "I can't say I completely understand this fascination to eat oneself into a pile of gluttony, but you seem to be enjoying yourself. Your joy is my joy. And, truth be told, I've never had a pillow as fine as you."

Celestia clapped her fore hooves together in glee. "Oh, you don't know how glad I am to hear that. Now, if you'll excuse me, there is a five layer cake that has my royal seal all over it."

Luna, however, pushed the table away as Celestia reached out. "Now, now, now, we can't have our precious ruler straining herself in any way. I think we can make you more comfortable for your feeding."

Celestia blinked in confusion. "Comfortable?"

"You have ruled this kingdom for a thousand years by yourself. It is time to be pampered!"
15422.title: Eating and Fat makes her So Happy

154221.content:
"Think of this as my thank-you gift" Luna said. With a lot of magic and some strain they had gotten Celestia onto her bed, in the privacy of her own room. It was a room fit for pampering, as even Celestia's enlarged frame was dwarfed by the gigantic mattress. She laid backwards onto a mountain of pillows, watching the way her stomach filled out in front of her. She wondered just how much more she'd have to eat to fill her bed. The thought was not one of academic curiosity; the more she indulged, the more she wanted to indulge.

"Thank you for what?" Celestia thought to ask, losing sight of Luna as the other princess prepared the continued feast. Luna just reappeared, smiling, and levitated a tub of mousse towards Celestia's mouth.

"Everything." Luna's voice was happy, sweet, and had a trace of something... edgier to it, not that Celestia could tell. She simply let her sister feed her, enjoying the delectable dessert. Luna took care of everything, switching up her foods so she never got sick of one flavor, wandering around the bed and shifting pillows and such. As Celestia ate her belly just became a bigger and bigger mound of fat, almost everything going straight there. But her legs thickened, her sides grew rolls, and more chins appeared while she was at it. And she was still hungry.

"Oh Luna, I'm so happy" Celestia cooed. "How much have I eaten?" She tried to rub her belly, finding her front legs harder to move.

"Let me get that." Luna spread her wings and fluttered on top of Celestia's stomach, which was now large enough for her to rest on easily. "Not enough." She decided, her voice gaining more of that edge. She began to nuzzle Celestia's belly, shifting slightly to feel its mass. Celestia cooed again, loving the feeling. Her fat was like her body pampering itself, making itself more comfortable, the perfect receptacle for pleasure. Feeling Luna stroke and pamper her was wonderful, and Celestia couldn't think of anypony she'd want to do this more with than her sister.

Luna slowly inched her way up until she and Celestia were face to face, and then the younger sister began to nuzzle her there too. She drew attention to Celestia's extra chins, thick neck, and pudgy cheeks, rubbing up against her. It was... sensual, certainly, but Celestia didn't shy away from these feelings. She needed them. She needed to feel like this, after being so strict and so alone for so long.

"Luna, I..." Celestia stopped, realizing Luna's face was just in front of hers. So slim, her sister was, so tiny in comparison now. She could cuddle against Celestia so well though, that much was certain, and Celestia could imagine her sister falling asleep on top of her, playing with her and always being near to pamper her. It was a lovely dream. But she loved her sister so dearly, and her sister was working so hard. Didn't she deserve a reward?
